channel.title: FU_Politics
channel.description: Ed The Sock's FU Politics. No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour
channel.itunes:subtitle: No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.
channel.itunes:summary: Canadian icon Ed the Sock is back and he’s shifted the target of his frank, honest humour to politics! “There’s too much important going on in the world to be talking about Kanye West & KPop. Mindless hordes have taken over political discourse and we’re taking it back.” The ‘we’ is longtime compatriot-turned-Youtube influencer Liana K and a handpicked roster of hosts and panelists - smart, bold, insightful and humourous. Small business owners, single moms, aspiring journalists, college students, Youtubers, a bar bouncer, a banker - a diverse group of people with a diverse range of life experiences. Camaraderie not enmity. Six series covering politics from every angle, including the unexpected. And all adhering to Ed the Sock’s first rule of FU_Politics: No pundits, No proxies, No jargon. Political talk that talks like us. At FU_Politics we talk with you, not at you. Plus, you’re going to laugh. Because laughter is a sign you still have your sanity.
channel.itunes:author: FU Politics

item.title: MATTER OF FACT - THE CANADIAN MEDIA - SERVING US OR THEM$ELVES?
item.itunes:title: MATTER OF FACT - THE CANADIAN MEDIA - SERVING US OR THEM$ELVES?
item.description:
There was a time when newsmedia was considered a public service. Not a clickbaiting cudgel.

@IshatReza and Prof S (@RCI_101) take a look at "The Good, The Bad and The Ugly" sides of Canadian News Media. What do we expect from our news sources? Are we receiving fair and balanced news reporting? What are some of the key challenges Canadian news media face?

Also included are our #cdnmedia and #cdnpoli fails of the week, and Prof S' Fact/Fiction!!!
#askIReza #cdnpoli
@IshatReza and Prof S (RCI_101) take a look at "The Good, The Bad and The Ugly" sides of Canadian News Media. What do we expect from our news sources? Are we receiving fair and balanced news reporting? What are some of the key challenges Canadian news media fact?
PLUS - our #cdnmedia and #cdnpoli fails of the week, and Prof S' Fact/Fiction!!!
#askIReza #cdnpoli
_________________________________
I know - podcasts are supposed to be free. But believe it or not, it costs money to make them. Especially when you insist on only honest discussions of issues and events without a paid-for corporate bias. FU_Politics is restoring what Big Media took from Canadians - frank, clear important national dialogues absent of jargon, paid pundits, propagandeers & people screaming over each other so neither can be heard. Plus, we've restored fun to the mix with the sense of humour absent in mainstream coverage.
But our computers need maintenance (one is almost dead), we need equipment and other stuff. So want to be part of the movement that's taking back Canadian media? Support us on Patreon or Paypal! Thank you. And thank yourself!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: STEPHEN/STEVEN - CHAIR GIRL & CORONA BOY - DOES SOCIAL MEDIA CREATE THESE MORONS?
item.itunes:title: STEPHEN/STEVEN - CHAIR GIRL & CORONA BOY - DOES SOCIAL MEDIA CREATE THESE MORONS?
item.description:
Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) and Stephen Lautens (@stephenlautens) discuss the chicken-or-egg question: did all these idiotic people doing idiotic things for social media 'fame' always exist, or has the lure of social media status pushed them toward greater & more dangerous (and stupid) acts they wouldn't do if their narcissism wasn't rewarded? Plus, the erasure of the line between 'famous & 'infamous' - how long ago did that start decaying to the point that a uniquely American mindset now infects Canadians?

____________________

Tin Cup time!

You think we like relying on you for funding?That we wouldn't rather get sponsors or grants or the like? But those come with strings attached. More like ropes than strings.

We want to remain honest, authentic and independent to bring you honest, authentic but fun programming. The right has an unending source of business capital, most of it shady, to use media to spoon-feed the public half-truths and full-out lies to re-shape our thinking to serve their divisive, greedy ends. So whose side are you on? If you pick us, and want to preserve & grow resistance to right-wing propagandized media, while supporting honest, peer-level intelligent & fun dialogue on important matters - support us! While we're fighting for the soul of your brain!

Become a monthly supporter through Patreon.com/funetworktv or give a one-time boost via Paypal to our address - funetworktv@gmail.com

Or don't complain when we all end-up speaking like Andrew Scheer.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: BROKEN CLOCK - FOR CRITICAL THINKERS: BANDWAGON FALLACIES, DERSHOWITZ NONSENSE & AYN RAND/GOLDEN GIRLS
item.itunes:title: BROKEN CLOCK - FOR CRITICAL THINKERS: BANDWAGON FALLACIES, DERSHOWITZ NONSENSE & AYN RAND/GOLDEN GIRLS
item.description:
Liana Kerzner (@redlianak) and Maus Merryjest tackle recent political foolishness! Bandwagon fallacies and appeals to authority! The many flaws of Alan Dershowitz’s Trump impeachment arguments! PLUS, How Derrida is the father of all hot takes, and how you can go from Ayn Rand to The Golden Girls in under two minutes!

They Kant even right now!

(They made me write that).

Raiders of the Lost Art - Critical Thinking! Listen, it'll give your brain workout endorphins without the nasty sweating!

_______________

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: MENSPLAINING - FEAR
item.itunes:title: MENSPLAINING - FEAR
item.description:
Men are supposed to be fearless, right? It's part of that whole 'macho masculinity' we're spoon-fed by media depictions of male heroes.

Bullsh*t.

Men have fears. Some small & silly, some much bigger and deeper. And it's facing fears, instead of pretending they don't have any, that makes men into Men.

Mensplaining - Men talking to men about being men in 2020. No whining, no recriminations, no Mens Rights propaganda - real talk among a variety of different types of men.

_________________________________________

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. item.title: FU_SPECIAL - THIS IS VANCOLOUR - MAYOR BRAD WEST TALKS SMACK ABOUT POLITICS, POLITICIANS AND MORE!
item.itunes:title: FU_SPECIAL - THIS IS VANCOLOUR - MAYOR BRAD WEST TALKS SMACK ABOUT POLITICS, POLITICIANS AND MORE!
item.description:
An FU_POLITICS special presentation of one of Canada's best podcasts - This is VANCOLOUR hosted by a Canadian rising-star, Mo Amir.

Think elected officials are always so careful with what they say that they don't say anything at all? Brad West, Mayor of Port Coquitlam, BC is not that kind of politician. In fact, his candid and often scathing remarks on political culture, communications, and cynicism will make your jaw drop. As will West's biting critique of specific high-profile political leadership (he names names!) leaving office for lobbyist jobs and work that he describes as against the national interest - sometimes even for foreign governments - is a rattling reality check for why Canadians need to get involved in politics now more than ever. Immensely popular, Mayor West's profile in British Columbia is on the rise as a truly fresh voice in the political landscape.

_______________________________________________

Support FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

item.title: KERZNER EXPEDITION - CHARLES ADLER ON POLITICAL CULTS & 'WHO IS THIS JACKASS VERSION OF PETER MACKAY?'
item.itunes:title: KERZNER EXPEDITION - CHARLES ADLER ON POLITICAL CULTS & 'WHO IS THIS JACKASS VERSION OF PETER MACKAY?'
item.description:
Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) & award-winning radio and TV broadcaster Charles Adler (Charles Adler Tonight, Global Radio) discuss the poison of political cults and how & why people fall into them, plus what happened to Conservative leadership favourite Peter MacKay to turn him from a reasonable decent guy to talking like Scheer 2.0? Who's pulling the strings??

___________________________

item.title: AMERICA'S HAT - CDN PODCAST ABOUT US POLITICS: SOTU, IOWA, BERNIE BROS & MORE
item.itunes:title: AMERICA'S HAT - CDN PODCAST ABOUT US POLITICS: SOTU, IOWA, BERNIE BROS & MORE
item.description:
FU_Politics is proud to debut America's Hat - a Canadian podcast about American Politics.

Hosted by award-winning TV producer & writer, radio host, journalist, Youtube influencer & speaker Liana Kerzner (@redlianak) with David Slavick (@davidslavick), an American political consultant living in Toronto who's worked in Democratic politics for almost two decades and spent years in Washington DC Think Tanks and grassroots lobbying.

On this episode: frank, fast-paced & funny dives into Trump's State of the Union speech & aftermath, the shitshow of the Iowa caucus, the single-minded dangers of Bernie Bros & more, with guest Gregory Simpson, a business journalist who works in the educational field.

If you love watching American politics, talking American politics and learning while laughing, without the BS of US cable news or mainstream news media, this show's the one you have been waiting for!

____

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.content:encoded:
FU_Politics is proud to debut America's Hat - a Canadian podcast about American Politics.

Hosted by award-winning TV producer & writer, radio host, journalist, Youtube influencer & speaker Liana Kerzner (@redlianak) with David Slavick (@davidslavick), an American political consultant living in Toronto who's worked in Democratic politics for almost two decades and spent years in Washington DC Think Tanks and grassroots lobbying.

On this episode: frank, fast-paced & funny dives into Trump's State of the Union speech & aftermath, the shitshow of the Iowa caucus, the single-minded dangers of Bernie Bros & more, with guest Gregory Simpson, a business journalist who works in the educational field.

If you love watching American politics, talking American politics and learning while laughing, without the BS of US cable news or mainstream news media, this show's the one you have been waiting for!

____

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Thank you!

item.title: STEPHEN/STEVEN - WHY LOONEY LEFT HATES PETE, BERNIE BROS & TRUMPERS: SEPARATED AT BIRTH & MORE
item.itunes:title: STEPHEN/STEVEN - WHY LOONEY LEFT HATES PETE, BERNIE BROS & TRUMPERS: SEPARATED AT BIRTH & MORE
item.description:
Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) and Stephen Lautens (@stephenlautens) pull no punches this week: Peter MacKay shows why he's unfit to lead the country & while he'll lead the federal Conservatives - at the same time; the irrational reasons the irrational Left hate the rational Pete Buttigeig, the egomania fueling Bernie Sanders and his supporters' conspiracy theories, how Bernie Bros & Trumpers are cut from the same cloth and more commentaries sure to enrage people who are already outraged or looking to be.

Listen. Then add your comment and 5-star review. Because the right-wing trolls are review-bombing FU_Politics because we scare the crap out of them, as facts always do.

_______

The Rebel is a hate-filled, bigoted Canadian website supported by right-wing xenophobes & greedy corporations that want to keep Canadians divided for fun & profit. Do you want The Rebel to be Canada's only political voice on the net, the 'Canada' we share with the world -- or do you want reasonable, rational, programming with intelligence & a sense of humour? If you chose the latter, then do your part, join the team, become a monthly patron through patreon.com/funetworktv or a one-time gift through Paypal at funetworktv@gmail.com. If you don't, don't blame us when the J. Crew clad Tiki torch brigade marches through your town!

FU_Politics - where smartass begins with smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - THE LIFELONG EFFECTS OF MALE BULLYING
item.description:
Continuing her mini-series examining the toxicity of bullying, Michelle Budiwski is joined by Byron Rutledge to discuss the effects of bullying in school from a male perspective and the long term ramifications of this type of abuse on self esteem, mental health and relationships.

item.title: HEY LADIES - MEN! THEIR CHALLENGES. HOW WOMEN CAN HELP THE MEN IN THEIR LIVES (AND LET THEM BE HELPED)
item.itunes:title: HEY LADIES - MEN! THEIR CHALLENGES. HOW WOMEN CAN HELP THE MEN IN THEIR LIVES (AND LET THEM BE HELPED)
item.description:
It's a Man's World. That doesn't mean the world doesn't chew them up and spit them out. Men over 50 have the highest suicide rates. Societal messages haven't taught men how to reach out for nor accept help. Whether our spouses, sons, fathers or friends, there are men in the lives of women who need help. Some may not even know it.

Lex Gore and Michelle Budiwski return to talk with Liana Kerzner about the challenges we see facing men, and how to support the men in our lives (and how to let them support us.) Suicide, incels, male body image, inverted privilege, and why every culture needs their version of a Bar Mitzvah!

_______________________________

Please support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important, frank & funny conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.itunes:summary: It's a Man's World. That doesn't mean the world doesn't chew them up and spit them out. Men over 50 have the highest suicide rates. Societal messages haven't taught men how to reach out for nor accept help. Whether our spouses, sons, fathers or friends, there are men in the lives of women who need help. Some may not even know it.Lex Gore and Michelle Budiwski return to talk with Liana Kerzner about the challenges we see facing men, and how to support the men in our lives (and how to let them support us.) Suicide, incels, male body image, inverted privilege, and why every culture needs their version of a Bar Mitzvah!_______________________________Please support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important, frank & funny conversations. item.title: ED THE SOCK - WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE?
item.itunes:title: ED THE SOCK - WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE?
item.description:
Ed the Sock doing what he does best - saying the things you want to say.

To both the Right & the Left a question: What the Hell is wrong with you people??!

Anyone with a different opinion is "evil"; you pick a 'team' and anything someone on your 'team' does you support and anything 'their team' does you scream your heads off with outrage - even when both those people have done the exact same thing!

And if someone on your team says anything positive about someone on the other team, you turn on your 'traitorous' now-former ally like a pack of wild dogs!

Don't fool yourself into believing 'they' are the problem - thinking like that makes you the problem' too! Righteous indignation does not mean you are right!

We're living The Lord of the Flies (it's a book, read it), picking tribes & behaving as Identity Politics soldiers in a stupid Culture War. And it's all a bunch of immature bullshit for cowards who don't have the guts to think for themselves! And for people lacking in common sense, individuality or any iota of consistent principles.

In short - smarten up or shut the f*ck up! The alt.right and control.left are taken us all down a rabbit hole to oblivion!

Ed wants you to know - Left or Right - he's not on your 'team' - and you shouldn't be either!

__________________________________________________

Straight talk. Real Talk. Talk that sounds like you because we are you. FU_Politics exists to give regular Canadians - you - the important political and social dialogues that are shaping our present and future. Dialogues that have been hijacked by political and media classes that don't speak like regular Canadians, don't live like regular Canadians and take away Canadians' seat at the table by enacting barriers of jargon, doublespeak, political hacks and clickbait radicals.

Those political & media classes are well-funded by deep pocket corporations in Canada & the US. We're powered by you. It's David vs a legion of Goliaths. So support our mission - yours and ours - to steal fire from the Gods. Restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations that are shaping the world we live in. Shows that sound like you - because we are you.

How can you support us? Listen to our podcasts, give thm 5-star reviews and comments and you an become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart. Patreon support start at $1 a month, but give what you can. Sure, it seems like a small amount of money but when enough of us contribute, it's powerful. Tearing down another brick in the wall. Small donations add up - just ask former President Obama. So - have we inspired you yet? Your voice is being suppressed, your future is being shaped by the people in ivory towers who don't give a crap about you. We do. We are you. Become part of us.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: BROKEN CLOCK - EMOTIONAL REASONING or WHAT MAKES PEOPLE VOTE AGAINST THEIR BEST INTERESTS?
item.itunes:title: BROKEN CLOCK - EMOTIONAL REASONING or WHAT MAKES PEOPLE VOTE AGAINST THEIR BEST INTERESTS?
item.description:
BROKEN CLOCK - A PODCAST ABOUT THE LOST ART OF CRITICAL THINKING!

EMOTIONAL REASONING - Yes, that's an oxymoron, but it's also what guides many people to vote for political parties or candidates - even when that vote is, logically, against their own best interests.

Liana Kerzner and Maus Merryjest delve into decision-making paralysis, rationalization fallacies, appeals to antiquity, feelings of betrayal, and other reasons people make political decisions without even knowing why.

_________

Hey - use some of that re-invigorated critical thinking ability and support our mission at FU_Politics - restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: Broken Clock Podcast - Critical Thinking Pet Peeves
item.itunes:title: Broken Clock Podcast - Critical Thinking Pet Peeves
item.description:
Broken Clock is a podcast about critical thinking. Remember that thing people used to do before drinking one team or another's Kool-Aid became so much easier than thinking for yourself?

In each episode of Broken Clock, Liana Kerzner and Maus Merryjest (no, that's not his real name; if you needed to be told that, you are in serious need of this podcast) discuss how to bring reason, plausibility and facts to bear on everything from politics to pop culture. And they also point out where people typically go wrong when they don't use their noodles.

In this debut first episode (probably redundant, 'debut' and 'first episode'), Liana and Maus exchange their critical thinking pet peeves: exceptions, fallacy fallacies, conflating correlation and causation and more, all leading to a discussion about online arguments over Star Wars.

____

Broken Clock - a Critical Thinking Podcast is part of Wave Two of series on FU_Politics as we continue our mission of restoring to everyday Canadians the important dialogues we need to have, without the barriers to entry blocked by pundits paid political proxies partisans and radicals that have taken over mainstream news media. Restoring intelligent discourse with a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions - that's FU_Politics.

Shows that sound like you - because we are you. And FU stands for more tha an attitude - also For Us and For U. So join our cause - Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

item.content:encoded:
Broken Clock is a podcast about critical thinking. Remember that thing people used to do before drinking one team or another's Kool-Aid became so much easier than thinking for yourself?

In each episode of Broken Clock, Liana Kerzner and Maus Merryjest (no, that's not his real name; if you needed to be told that, you are in serious need of this podcast) discuss how to bring reason, plausibility and facts to bear on everything from politics to pop culture. And they also point out where people typically go wrong when they don't use their noodles.

In this debut first episode (probably redundant, 'debut' and 'first episode'), Liana and Maus exchange their critical thinking pet peeves: exceptions, fallacy fallacies, conflating correlation and causation and more, all leading to a discussion about online arguments over Star Wars.

____

Broken Clock - a Critical Thinking Podcast is part of Wave Two of series on FU_Politics as we continue our mission of restoring to everyday Canadians the important dialogues we need to have, without the barriers to entry blocked by pundits paid political proxies partisans and radicals that have taken over mainstream news media. Restoring intelligent discourse with a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions - that's FU_Politics.

Shows that sound like you - because we are you. And FU stands for more tha an attitude - also For Us and For U. So join our cause - Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: STEPHEN/STEVEN - TORIES CLEARING THE DECK FOR MACKAY - OR HARPER??
item.itunes:title: STEPHEN/STEVEN - TORIES CLEARING THE DECK FOR MACKAY - OR HARPER??
item.description:
Jean Charest - gone. Pierre Poilievre - gone. Rona Ambrose - gone. All serious candidates for the leadership of the Conservative Party of Canada; some announced their leadership bid only to withdraw shortly thereafter, or declined to run. Who's been pulling the strings behind the scenes to make these once very-committed candidates to drop out?

Meanwhile former PM Stephen Harper resigns from the board of the Conservative Fund, rumoured to be inspired by his desire to block Charest. But was that the reason? Is Harper the one still controlling the CPC and if so, did he get other serious candidates to walk away to clear the decks for Peter MacKay...or did he do it to clear the decks for his own bid to re-take the leadership?!

Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) and Stephen Lautens (@stephenlautens) discuss these tantalizing speculations - and if there's a well-known, well-liked non-political person in the wings planning to do what Bloomberg & Steyer did to the US Democratic race?

Listen. Comment. Share. Engage. SUPPORT!

Our mission at FU_Politics is to restore to regular Canadians important national conversations that have been hijacked by pundits, political hacks, proxies & partisans. Intelligent discourse with a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

item.title: MENSPLAINING - BOY TOYS: THE TOYS THAT MADE US THE MEN WE ARE
item.itunes:title: MENSPLAINING - BOY TOYS: THE TOYS THAT MADE US THE MEN WE ARE
item.description:
You've heard the saying - "The only difference between men and boys is the size of their toys." (Why is it always about size?)

In this less serious, more fun episode, our Mensplaining panelists talk about their favourite boyhood toys and how those toys reflected who they were, how they were taught about 'manliness' and what kids gained by playing with real, plastic toys, in person with friends or alone with their own imaginations, and the importance of it all.

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: KEEPING IT REAL - CONFESSIONS OF A FORMER BULLY!
item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - CONFESSIONS OF A FORMER BULLY!
item.description:
As she continues her deep-dive into bullying in the electronic age, Michelle Budiwski shares her own insight as both a victim of bullying and as a teenage bully herself. Because before we can effectively combat cyber-bullying we have to be brutally honest and face the uncomfortable truths of why bullies bully, where they learn to bully and how they choose their victims.


_____

Hey - what Michelle talks about on Keeping It Real is important stuff, the kind of stuff regular Canadians face every day but escape the attention of the moneyed and political classes. So support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations that the powers-that-be try to suppress with distracting stories about beards and donuts. At FUN - The FU_Network our shows sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.content:encoded:
As she continues her deep-dive into bullying in the electronic age, Michelle Budiwski shares her own insight as both a victim of bullying and as a teenage bully herself. Because before we can effectively combat cyber-bullying we have to be brutally honest and face the uncomfortable truths of why bullies bully, where they learn to bully and how they choose their victims.

_____

Hey - what Michelle talks about on Keeping It Real is important stuff, the kind of stuff regular Canadians face every day but escape the attention of the moneyed and political classes. So support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations that the powers-that-be try to suppress with distracting stories about beards and donuts. At FUN - The FU_Network our shows sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: KEEPING IT REAL - BULLYING, CYBER BULLYING & HOW TO STOP A BULLY!
item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - BULLYING, CYBER BULLYING & HOW TO STOP A BULLY!
item.description:
The schoolyard bully is a trope - someone many of us had to face down or left us face-down. But then we could go home and be safe. That was before the internet. Now, no place is safe, for kids or adults. The internet has made it possible for bullies to harass, threaten, extort and humiliate people 24/7.

Social media especially thrives on adults bullying adults, adults bullying kids, kids bullying kids and hate oozing through society from every electronic orifice. How do we shut these bullies down and how do we teach our children compassion, empathy and respect while they're growing up in an internet fueled age of rage?

Hey, look down here...yeah, right here...now that we got your attention, how about throwing your support behind our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: ED THE SOCK - WHY MONIKA DEOL DIDN'T TALK TO HIM FOR 20 YEARS + HOW EC WILL SAVE THE WORLD!
item.itunes:title: ED THE SOCK - WHY MONIKA DEOL DIDN'T TALK TO HIM FOR 20 YEARS + HOW EC WILL SAVE THE WORLD!
item.description:
CAUTION: DIRTY LAUNDRY AHEAD

Though Ed and the legendary dance diva Monika Deol both worked at Muchmusic at the same time, they only ever once appeared on-air together - and that time was the last time for a reason! Ed talks about what he said that kept him & Monika incommunicado for over 20 years (be warned: it was a different time with different sensibilities).

NOW Ed & Monika,along with Rick "The Temp" Campanelli are working together again on the re-invented re-imagined ELECTRIC CIRCUS EXPERIENCE national tour! And Ed tells you how the new ECX will save the world!!

Hey - help Ed keep gas in the tank, because "Show on the Road" sounds a lot better than "Show sitting on the driveway!" Support FUN - The FU_Network & FU_Politics, restoring the spark of magical honest, authentic, unpredictable, funny & smart that made classic Muchmusic great! Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: ED THE SOCK ON THE ROAD - DID BELL MEDIA KILL MUCHMUSIC? NO!! BUT SOMEONE(S) DID!
item.itunes:title: ED THE SOCK ON THE ROAD - DID BELL MEDIA KILL MUCHMUSIC? NO!! BUT SOMEONE(S) DID!
item.description:
Question Ed gets sick of answering: "Did Bell Media (the company that bought Muchmusic from CHUM TV) kill Muchmusic?" So he gives the answer loud and clear - NO!! There was a reason Ed quit Much before the sale was even contemplated - Much killed itself! Here's some of the how & why!

Plus a little info on the reinvention and revival of Electric Circus with Monika Deol, multi-camera online retro dance party extravaganza!

Hey - if you like Ed's frank & funny musings while driving, put a little gas in Ed's tank! Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: STEPHEN & STEVEN - DOWNED PASSENGER PLANE. ASSASSINATED IRANIAN. AMERICA'S DEMOCRACY IN SHREDS.WELCOME TO 2020!
item.itunes:title: STEPHEN & STEVEN - DOWNED PASSENGER PLANE. ASSASSINATED IRANIAN. AMERICA'S DEMOCRACY IN SHREDS.WELCOME TO 2020!
item.description:
It's the first month of 2020 and it's already shaping up to be a sequel to the sh*tshow that was 2019.

Iranian General and terrorist plotter assassinated by President Trump, leaving America's democracy in crisis. A Ukrainian airliner full of civilians downed by an Iranian "error" in the fog of war. And an outraged Canadian corporate CEO speaks from the heart.

And we still haven't reached the Democratic primaries - or the US Presidential race.

Put on your seatbelt, it's going to be a bumpy ride.

Hosts:

Stephen Lautens (@stephenlautens)

Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner)

Frank, smart dialogue and debate without the jargon, pundits or political proxies. That's FU_Politics.

Help support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you.

item.itunes:author: FU Politics

item.title: FU_POLITICS REPORT - IRAN VS. USA. CIVILIANS KILLED IN THE CROSSFIRE. IT'S HAPPENED BEFORE. WHAT HAVE WE LEARNED?
item.itunes:title: FU_POLITICS REPORT - IRAN VS. USA. CIVILIANS KILLED IN THE CROSSFIRE. IT'S HAPPENED BEFORE. WHAT HAVE WE LEARNED?
item.description:
While the rest of the media cries its crocodile tears over the tragedy of lives lost on a Ukrainian airliner, using it as grist for the mill of political reporting of Trump-centric clickbait, this FU_Politics Report focuses on the real victims - the dead, their families and loved ones.

This kind of tragedy has happened before. One of them resulted in even greater loss of Canadian life - the Air India terrorist bombing of 1985, which took off from Montreal and exploded over the Atlantic. There's much to learn from every tragedy. What did we learn from Air India? What mistakes did the government and media make? What did they get right? And how can those lessons be applied to reduce the human cost to the loved ones and friends of those who died on Ukrainian International Airlines Flight 752?

Both our guests have very direct, very different personal connections to the Air India bombing and offer their reflections, experience and advice on a very human level.

Host: Steven Kerzner

Panel:

Taleeb Noormohamed was the director of the Air India review secretariat, responsible for all activities related to the review of the bombing investigation and the final report issued by bob rae, including coordinating with agencies of the Canadian government including the RCMP, CSIS and Transport Canada as well as with foreign government and working with the families of the victims.

Liana Kerzner, co-founder of FU_Network, host of the FU_Politics podcast Hey Ladies, a broadcaster, award-winning TV writer/producer/performer, radio host, popular Youtuber, journalist and public speaker. But for this show, none of that matters. What matters is that Liana, as a girl in 1st grade, lost her friend and classmate to a terrorist air tragedy.

Putting a human spin on the news. FU_Politics Reports.

Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

item.title: MENSPLAINING - CARS & THE MEN WHO LOVE THEM (AND WHY)
item.itunes:title: MENSPLAINING - CARS & THE MEN WHO LOVE THEM (AND WHY)
item.description:
Are they just penis extensions? Powerful metal symbols of virility? Wealth? Power? (all of which take us back to society's idea of male virility) Or is there more to a man's relationship to his car? How does automotive marketing target men? And does it work like it used to???

Our panel discusses, debates and laughs - a lot! So will you.

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. item.itunes:author: FU Politics

item.title: HEY LADIES - "SLUT" - it's history, usage, power & meaning
item.itunes:title: HEY LADIES - "SLUT" - it's history, usage, power & meaning
item.description:
Liana Kerzner and panel take no prisoners- again - with this honest, blunt, insightful discussion about he word "Slut" - where it came from (not where you think), how it's changed, how it's used today, it's power and meaning to each panelist.

Host:

Liana Kerzner is a podcaster, Youtuber, award-winning TV producer/writer/host, radio broadcaster, journalist & public speaker.

Panel:

Roze Jardine - Producer and playwright Roze Jardine is a life coach and a youth advocate, who uses the arts as a catalyst to bring to light a variety of social issues for the purpose of dialogue, community engagement and social change.

Lex Gore - very non-traditional wife & mother, punk musician, anti-hate activist who's "'triggered' people by encouraging critical thinking and not subscribing to every ever changing word mincing semantic piece of dogma the far left and right constantly spew." Her words, not ours. But very true.

You won't find down-to-earth, no BS, intelligent talk anywhere else in Canadian media. That's why we created FU_Politics. FU stands for more than an attitude, it stands for For Us and For U - not for the media & political classes that create barriers by baffling with bullsh*t. Support our mission - become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: KEEPING IT REAL - MAKING (DIFFICULT) CHANGES
item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - MAKING (DIFFICULT) CHANGES
item.description:
Michelle, a recovering addict, as well as a mother, wife, business owner, broadcaster & podcaster, talks about the challenge of making life changes that you know you need to make, but for numerous reasons, haven't. Not a step-by-step guide, instead a relatable story about real people. No finger-wagging or guilt. We promise.

Michelle, a recovering addict, as well as a mother, wife, business owner, broadcaster & podcaster, talks about the challenge of making life changes that you know you need to make, but for numerous reasons, haven't. Not a step-by-step guide, instead a relatable story about real people. No finger-wagging or guilt. We promise.

item.title: KEEPING IT REAL - INSIDE ADDICTION
item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - INSIDE ADDICTION
item.description:
Michelle Bidiwski, in addition to being a wife, mother, business owner, broadcaster & podcaster - is a recovering addict. There are a lot more people out there like her than we care to admit. Michelle shares her emotionally-wrenching personal daily battle with addiction. Facing addiction. Fighting it. Victories. Setbacks. Not surrendering. There's a lot to be learned from everyone's personal battle. This is what Michelle's learned. Maybe it will help you or someone close to you.

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: ZODCAST - BUILDING A PODCAST NETWORK ON A SHOESTRING WITH KERZNERS & ED THE SOCK
item.itunes:title: ZODCAST - BUILDING A PODCAST NETWORK ON A SHOESTRING WITH KERZNERS & ED THE SOCK
item.description:
Neil Waytowich (@waytowichneil) talks to Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) and Liana Kerzner (@redlianak) the founders of FUN - The FU_Network & FU_Politics about the death of Muchmusic, the motivation to build a network of authentic voices to replace it, how they did it, why a voice for Canadians matters and how algorithms have taken over our lives.

Plus special guest Ed the Sock, co-founder and inspiration for FU_Network, talks about how he became a central media figure during the last election, a lightning rod for Conservative Party fear-based shenanigans and whether he saw any of it coming, or even wanted it to.

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: ZODCAST- HUMAN COST OF DOUG FORD'S CUTS!
item.itunes:title: ZODCAST- HUMAN COST OF DOUG FORD'S CUTS!
item.description:
Neil Waytowich (@waytowichneil) speaks with three Ontarians who have been directly affected by Doug Ford’s cuts - three people with very personal stories to tell.

It is time to calculate the human cost of the Ford government's "efficiencies" and hear from real people who have been affected by the callous cuts used to fund Ford's wasteful pet peeves: proud autism mom and advocate, Suzi Panovska-Guarrasi. A certified teacher with 12 years experience who received a redundancy notice, Sarah Carlyon. I also speak with reluctant autism advocate and Twitter (bleeped)-kicking machine, Dr. Hannah Rasmussen. Together they represent Doug Ford's worst nightmare.

________________________

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, telling the stories of real people the media elites ignore, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: KERZNER EXPEDITION - ALI VELSHI
item.itunes:title: KERZNER EXPEDITION - ALI VELSHI
item.description:
Ali Velshi is an Emmy-award-winning journalist, best-selling author, noted expert on finance & business and a star anchor on cable news network MSNBC.

How did a Canadian, born in Kenya, come to be such a powerful voice in American cable news?

Steven talks to Ali about that journey and the challenges facing journalists in Trump's America, the gulf between stories the news/political classes focus on and what's important to everyday people, how to fight deliberate ignorance and opposition to facts and the type of news stories which continue to haunt him.

A 'must-listen' for those concerned about the spread of false news, 'fake news' and the political forces promoting both. Plus, there's also the trademark FU_Politics humour that keeps the conversation entertaining as well as informative.

Host: Steven Kerzner, founder of FUN - The FU_Network, award-winning TV writer/producer, radio host and multimedia consultant.

If you like this show and it's jargon-free, peer-level style - support our mission at FU_Politics of restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to media. Important conversations that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: STAR WARS - DID ANYONE NEED THE PREQUELS & SEQUELS?
item.itunes:title: STAR WARS - DID ANYONE NEED THE PREQUELS & SEQUELS?
item.description:
When Da Vinci made the Mona Lisa, there was no sequel. When Michaelangelo painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel, did he paint 6 other ceilings? Even up to the 1970s, sequels weren't an automatic response to a movie making money. So why did Star Wars need 6 movies made after the original trilo gy stamped its cultural imprint on the world?

Did the prequels/sequels make the Skywalker saga deeper & richer, or did they just dilute the potency of the original three films?

Guest host Steven Kerzner and his panel discuss & debate this topic plus the many ways Star Wars was a game-changer for science-fiction, sci-fi cinema, licensed movie merchandise and more. Also how Star Wars fans ruined Star Wars!

Hey, support our rebel alliance at FU_Politics trying to overthrow, or at least put up a good fight, against powerful corporate media empires that want to stomp out any resistance to their money-making, soul-eating agendas. Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. item.title: IS "MERRY CHRISTMAS" OFFENSIVE? OTHER FAITHS SOUND OFF
item.itunes:title: IS "MERRY CHRISTMAS" OFFENSIVE? OTHER FAITHS SOUND OFF
item.description:
Ground zero for the so-called "War on Christmas" was retail clerks & cashiers being told not to say "Merry Christmas" to customers, replaced with the generic "Happy Holidays." This spread and became the new normal for businesses and politicians and all in the name of inclusiveness - not wanting to offend people of non-Christian faiths. But did anyone ask the people of non-Christian faiths if hearing "Merry Christmas" offended them??

Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) hosts a panel of Jews, Muslims, Hindus, Atheists and others to talk ask about "Merry Christmas," but also about what the Christmas holiday season means to people raised in different faith & non-faith backgrounds, what traditions non-Christians have developed to make the holiday meaningful to them.

If you're expecting a brawl-for-it-all between competing faiths & atheists & lost of Christmas-bashing - well...spoiler alert - your expectations are off-base. These are Canadians, after all.

Is "Merry Christmas" offensive to non-Christians? Listen to the show. The answers may surprise you!

_______

This spread and became the new normal for businesses and politicians and all in the name of inclusiveness - not wanting to offend people of non-Christian faiths. But did anyone ask the people of non-Christian faiths if hearing "Merry Christmas" offended them??Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) hosts a panel of Jews, Muslims, Hindus, Atheists and others to talk ask about "Merry Christmas," but also about what the Christmas holiday season means to people raised in different faith & non-faith backgrounds, what traditions non-Christians have developed to make the holiday meaningful to them. If you're expecting a brawl-for-it-all between competing faiths & atheists & lost of Christmas-bashing - well...spoiler alert - your expectations are off-base. These are Canadians, after all.Is "Merry Christmas" offensive to non-Christians? Listen to the show. The answers may surprise you!_______Hey Santas- support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.description:
Michelle Bidiwski keeps it real this episode about what will save political conservatives as well as the country: a good healthy dose of Red Tories!

Host Michelle Budiwski (Budooski) it's a social activist, author motivational speaker living in rural Manitoba just outside of Brandon with her husband and four children.

item.title: ED THE SOCK - HOW RIGHT-WING MEDIA KICKS LEFT-WING MEDIA'S ASS PLUS OTHER STUFF
item.itunes:title: ED THE SOCK - HOW RIGHT-WING MEDIA KICKS LEFT-WING MEDIA'S ASS PLUS OTHER STUFF
item.description:
Ed the Sock's Sermon from the Car returns as he drives from outside Toronto to the city that never stop digging up major roadways.

Topics: Why right-wing media has been so successful in convincing people to vote against their own interests while centrist & left-wing media hobble along like Tiny Tim on his crutches - and how the tables can be turned, or at least the playing field mad level.

Also: why do some websites make your own password so classified that they won't even let you see what password you just typed in??! What, we can't be trusted to see our own passwords?!!

And the topic nobody wants to talk about but everyone wants addressed: toilet seat etiquette when having guests over. Not just 'seat up or seat down' but clean the damned rorschach blots under the seat!

The serious, the less serious and the disgusting-but-must-be-said all rolled into one big return episode. Don't keep this podcast your own selfish secret, share the damned thing with friends!

_____

And hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. FU_Politics - where Smartass begins with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.title: FU_SPECIAL - ANIMAL RIGHTS ON "THIS IS VANCOLOUR" WITH MO AMIR & REBEKAH BREDER
item.itunes:title: FU_SPECIAL - ANIMAL RIGHTS ON "THIS IS VANCOLOUR" WITH MO AMIR & REBEKAH BREDER
item.description:
Rebekah Breder is Canada's leading animal rights lawyer. Host Mo Amir talks to Rebekah about animal rights, animal rights laws and the new ban on captive cetaceans (whale/dolphin) that the Trudeau government brought in this year. The implications of the new law, the grey areas, and what this means and why it's important.

Host: Mo Amir @thisisvancolour

Guest: Rebekah Breder is a lawyer who made the top spot on Canadian Lawyer's list of The Top 25 Most Influential Lawyers of 2019. Her firm, Breder Law, acts exclusively for advancing the rights and welfare of animals, both domestic and wildlife.

"This is Vancolour" is Canada's leading west-coast based podcast hosted by regular FU_Politics panelist Mo Amir.

________________________________________

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. item.title: HEY LADIES - SURVIVING THE HOLIDAYS!
item.itunes:title: HEY LADIES - SURVIVING THE HOLIDAYS!
item.description:
Charity, Coping, and Competing Values at Christmas

It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas (and Hanukkah & secular stat holidays)! Liana and the HEY LADIES panel have a wide-ranging conversation about holiday survival including commercialism, sentimentality, addiction recovery, trans inclusion, a potential upside of traditional gender roles. Also, why we hate gift cards!

Host: Liana Kerzner - Award-winning comedy writer & TV producer, journalist, speaker & thought-provoker on women's issues (@redlianak, LianaK channel on Youtube)

Panel:

Lara Rae is a 25 year stand up comedy veteran and comedy writer. She was involved with the creation of Little Mosque on the Prairie and spent 18 years as Artistic Director of the Winnipeg Comedy Festival. She now runs a food insecurity reduction organization called Pantry.

Michelle Budiwski (Budooski) it's a social activist, author motivational speaker living in rural Manitoba just outside of Brandon with her husband and four children. Michelle hosts the KEEPING IT REAL podcast on FU_Politics.

item.title: ROCK 'EM SOCK' EM POLITICS - SCHEER'S GONE!
item.itunes:title: ROCK 'EM SOCK' EM POLITICS - SCHEER'S GONE!
item.description:
#SCHEERHYPOCRISY was trending during the election - turns out it was right! Conservative leader Andrew Scheer resigns after party donors rebel at news that Andy was sending his 5 kids to private school on their dime! This paragon protector of the public purse and defender of ethics & transparency (chocolate) milked the system while calling Justin Trudeau a "fraud"!

Revealed: the skullduggery within Conservative Party HQ that lost patience waiting for Andy to vamoose!

So who's next? What's next? Do the Conservatives take a further turn to the Right or elect someone electable? Peter McKay? Rona Ambrose? Won't be Michael Chong - Ed says he's so electable the Conservatives will never elect him leader! And you won't believe the name Ed suggests for CPC leader - and why!

Also - the mnemonic device Ed discovers to remember how to pronounce a panelist's last name - Beavis & Butthead would be proud!

Host: Ed the Sock

Panel:

Hafeez Noorani

Ryan Ballantine

Samantha Emann

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. item.title: STEPHEN & STEVEN - WHY OUR GOVT IS DYSFUNCTIONAL (HINT: 'LOYAL' OPPOSITION)
item.itunes:title: STEPHEN & STEVEN - WHY OUR GOVT IS DYSFUNCTIONAL (HINT: 'LOYAL' OPPOSITION)
item.description:
We're not getting the governance we deserve, and Steven & Stephen discuss a few reasons why:

How can Trudeau's Liberals govern when the "loyal opposition" is only loyal to itself and its future political fortunes? Opposition parties are supposed to find ways to improve or point out the flaws or overlooked issues in proposed legislation so the best laws go into place for the Canadian people. This can't happen when it's "us vs them" instead of all parties working for the good of Canadians.

Also, did Trudeau really do anything wrong at the NATO summit? SHould world leaders recognize that in a public gathering, mics are everywhere and be discreet? Will this affect our relations with the USA?

And Trudeau-bashing itself -blackface, brownface, etc - has taken the place of actual cogent criticism of his government's policies and performance. Who is this helping?!

Insightful, informative, engaging and funny conversation with @stephenlautens & @stevenjkerzner - just two guys who know things!

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: MATTER OF FACT - LIBERAL GOVT. THRONE SPEECH - WHAT'S IT MEAN FOR YOU?
item.itunes:title: MATTER OF FACT - LIBERAL GOVT. THRONE SPEECH - WHAT'S IT MEAN FOR YOU?
item.description:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau set his government's second-term agenda with the Throne Speech. So, what does that mean for you and for Canada? Ishat Reza and Professor S lay it out for you! Plus a review of the new players in Cabinet, and the familiar faces in new roles. And of course - our #cdnmedia and #cdnpoli fails of the week, and Prof S' Fact/Fiction!!!

item.title: ZODCAST - What's different between Canadians & Americans, Wexit & journalism death watch!
item.itunes:title: ZODCAST - What's different between Canadians & Americans, Wexit & journalism death watch!
item.description:
Neil (Zod) and community newspaper publisher, author and musician Dave Bidini discuss the challenges facing independent journalism, life as a musician in Canada, and Dave's evolution as an author and artist and what it means to tell uniquely Canadian stories.
In a wide ranging conversation Mo Amir and Neil discuss Canadian identity, what separates Canadians from Americans, wexit and western alienation, and Canadian patriotism. We explore whether Canadian inferiority extends to arts and culture and how Canada's maturation is changing the need for external validation. Neil and Mo make a new years resolution to shine a light on good journalism and agree that Nora Loreto is both underrated and a lightning rod for controversy and what that says about male privilege.
Host: Neil (Zod) Waytowich @WaytowichNeil
Guests:
Dave Bidini (@hockeyesque) (@westendphoenix), author, musician (Rheostatics), founder & publisher of Toronto's community newspaper West End Phoenix
Mo Amir - (@thisisvancolour) critically-acclaimed political commentator & interviewer and host of the popular podcast "This is Vancolour".
________

item.title: HEY LADIES - IS IT TOO HARD TO BE A MODERN MOM?
item.itunes:title: HEY LADIES - IS IT TOO HARD TO BE A MODERN MOM?
item.description:
Hey ladies - with all the demands on the modern woman, has it become too hard to be a good, effective, engaged, loving, attentive Mom? Two very different moms with very different lifestyles and life choices share with Liana their diverse challenges raising good kids and not going crazy doing it!
Host: Liana Kerzner @redlianak
Panel:
Roze - Producer and playwright Roze Jardine' is a life coach and a youth advocate, who uses the arts as a catalyst to bring to light a variety of social issues for the purpose of dialogue, community engagement and social change.

Heather - Heather is a stay-at-home mom of awesomeness who homeschools to her two children. She contributes her very limited spare time to various causes in her community.
___

item.title: CANADIAN POLITIQUE - PARLIAMENT IS BACK - BUCKLE UP, HERE WE GO!
item.itunes:title: CANADIAN POLITIQUE - PARLIAMENT IS BACK - BUCKLE UP, HERE WE GO!
item.description:
New Parliament! Same Prime Minister! Minority government! And Scheer's still hanging around! What can we expect from this new landscape in Ottawa? What should we expect - or are expectations only a precursor to disappointment? Cameron Bishop (@CanadianPolitique), Lee-Anne Goodman (@leeanne25) & Mike MacDougall (@mike_macdougall) talk the new Cabinet, what we expect from the Throne Speech, and whether Andrew Scheer's leadership of the CPC can survive!

Also follow @CanadianPolitique on Twitter for updated political discourse as things happen!

Panel:
Lee-Anne Goodman is a veteran journalist and onetime White House correspondent who now works in strategic communications.
Mike MacDougall is an east coaster living in Toronto. He is absolutely not qualified to talk about politics, but he doesn’t care. When not complaining about conservatives, he is usually at a punk show, or a Jays game.
Cameron Bishop is a political junkie, a former Liberal staffer to MPs and cabinet ministers and a is passionate about engaging progressive Canadians. He’s the product of a Conservative upbringing but embraces the fight for social justice, equity & equality and fairness for all. You’ll never see him at a punk show or a Jays game, because when it comes to music and sport he’s pretty well illiterate.

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.itunes:subtitle: New Parliament! Same Prime Minister! Minority government! And Scheer's still hanging around! What can we expect from this new landscape in Ottawa? What should we expect - or are expectations only a precursor to disappointment? Cameron Bishop (@CanadianPo...
item.itunes:summary: New Parliament! Same Prime Minister! Minority government! And Scheer's still hanging around! What can we expect from this new landscape in Ottawa? What should we expect - or are expectations only a precursor to disappointment? Cameron Bishop (@CanadianPolitique), Lee-Anne Goodman (@leeanne25) & Mike MacDougall (@mike_macdougall) talk the new Cabinet, what we expect from the Throne Speech, and whether Andrew Scheer's leadership of the CPC can survive!Also follow @CanadianPolitique on Twitter for updated political discourse as things happen!Panel:Lee-Anne Goodman is a veteran journalist and onetime White House correspondent who now works in strategic communications. Mike MacDougall is an east coaster living in Toronto. He is absolutely not qualified to talk about politics, but he doesn’t care. When not complaining about conservatives, he is usually at a punk show, or a Jays game. Cameron Bishop is a political junkie, a former Liberal staffer to MPs and cabinet ministers and a is passionate about engaging progressive Canadians. He’s the product of a Conservative upbringing but embraces the fight for social justice, equity & equality and fairness for all. You’ll never see him at a punk show or a Jays game, because when it comes to music and sport he’s pretty well illiterate. Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. item.itunes:title: MENSPLAINING - MR. ROGERS!

item.title: HEY LADIES - BITCH! What does the word mean to you?
item.itunes:title: HEY LADIES - BITCH! What does the word mean to you?
item.description:
Hey Ladies - women talking to women the way women really talk to women. Honest, unfiltered and sometimes 'unladylike.'

In the debut episode host Liana Kerzner & her panel take a big swing - BITCH! What does the word mean to individual women?!

Host: Liana Kerzner (@redlianak) - award-winning TV writer/producer & personality, journalist, editorialist, public speaker. Find her on her Youtube channel Liana K

Panel:

Roze Jardine - Producer and playwright Roze Jardine is a life coach and a youth advocate, who uses the arts as a catalyst to bring to light a variety of social issues for the purpose of dialogue, community engagement and social change.

Lex Gore - very non-traditional wife & mother, punk musician, anti-hate activist who's "'triggered' people by encouraging critical thinking and not subscribing to every ever changing word mincing semantic piece of dogma the far left and right constantly spew." Her words, not ours. But very true.

If you like Hey Ladies (and why wouldn't you?) support the show and our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: MENSPLAINING - MEN'S ISSUES ARE NO LAUGHING MATTER!
item.itunes:title: MENSPLAINING - MEN'S ISSUES ARE NO LAUGHING MATTER!
item.description:
International Men's Day happened recently, and the mockery the hashtag got on Twitter from first women, then some men, underscored how little is understood or respected about the issues Men face, because 'patriarchy'. This isn't about the Men's Rights Movement, who are primarily a bunch of anti-women whackos, this is about things like men over 50 having the highest suicide rate in North America - why?? We offer some answers, including how men make their job not what they do but who they are; why men don't seek out care for mental health issues - or admit they have them. Sounds like pretty heavy stuff - and it is - but somehow we manage to include a generous portion of laughter too!

Host: Ed the Sock

Panel:

Hafeez Noorani - digital marketing and content analyst and producer of Mensplaining.

Paul Marlow - "Tall Paul" *tallpaul.ca* (he's 6'7", for real) is an athlete, entrepreneur, fitness trainer & a voice for mental health.

Andrew Willis - lightning in a bottle, Andy's full of personality, humour & insights & host of his own radio show which can be found at andylandradio.com!

Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring to Canadian media the intelligence, civility, opinions based in fact and a sense of humour that we've been missing! Become a patron, with a monthly donation (whatever you can afford) or a one-time support boost on Paypal! A little goes a long way!

Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. Andrew Willis - lightning in a bottle, Andy's full of personality, humour & insights & host of his own radio show which can be found at andylandradio.com!Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring to Canadian media the intelligence, civility, opinions based in fact and a sense of humour that we've been missing! Become a patron, with a monthly donation (whatever you can afford) or a one-time support boost on Paypal! A little goes a long way!Hey - support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring intelligent discourse, a sense of humour, civility and fact-based opinions to important conversations. Shows that sound like you - because we are you. Become a monthly patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a one time boost at Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com. item.title: KEEPING IT REAL - A CHILD MURDERED. CITY SHOCKED. DOMESTIC ABUSE MUST STOP.
item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - A CHILD MURDERED. CITY SHOCKED. DOMESTIC ABUSE MUST STOP.
item.description:
On October 30, 2019 the news of an innocent 3 year-old child stabbed in his bed while he slept rocked the city of Winnipeg. He died three days later and as news of this horrific crime came to light and the history of Intimate Partner Violence between the child's mother and his killer came to light. The keyboard warriors of social media went on the attack looking to place blame.

But this tragic story isn't about blame. It's about responsibility - OUR responsibility as a society to keep the conversations going so that we can bridge the gaps that failed this child and this family and prevent another tragedy from ever happening again.

Domestic violence and abuse has not disappeared from our communities, we just don't talk about it - and if we don't talk about it, we can never fix it.

So - let's talk. Now.

Host: Michelle Bidiwski

Support our work to bring important dialogues to Canadians without the screaming matches, salacious innuendo or obvious political agendas seen in other media. Become a Patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or gives us a one-time boost at Payl - funetworktv@gmail.com

item.title: KERZNER EXPEDITION - MARK CRITCH & POLITICAL SATIRE IN CANADA
item.itunes:title: KERZNER EXPEDITION - MARK CRITCH & POLITICAL SATIRE IN CANADA
item.description:
CBC's "22 Minutes" star talks to Steven about the importance of political satire to Canada & democracy, why terrorists attacked a French satire magazine, what it's like speaking truth to power - right in power's face, how our leaders act before & after the cameras (and jokes) are turned off, why he got angry at CBC News, the backstage cat-collar controversy that caused Justin Trudeau to avoid him for a year, how Stephen Harper chased the crew to be on TV - until he was Prime Minister - but also, surprising, endearing. human and funny qualities of Stephen Harper that the former-PM only showed off-camera! Plus..well, more.

Host: Steven Kerzner

We know you support CBC with tax dollars, but we don't get any of that - we need your support on patreon.com/funetworktv or Paypal funetworktv@gmail.com to keep FU_Politics series going & growing!

item.title: SHOW ON THE ROAD - INT'L MEN'S DAY MOCKERY, CHARLIE'S ANGELS & TEETH!
item.itunes:title: SHOW ON THE ROAD - INT'L MEN'S DAY MOCKERY, CHARLIE'S ANGELS & TEETH!
item.description:
You're in the passenger seat as Ed takes his weekly drive from FU_Network HQ to Toronto! So many topics flow from one to another it's hard to list them all, but some main ones: societal pressures men face & women who laugh at them, why the umpteenth "Charlie's Angels" reboot movie failed - and it ain't sexism like director Elizabeth Banks claims (great way to deflect from making a crappy movie). ALSO - learning to apply the lost art of critical thinking using the Don Cherry/Jess Allen/Trudeau Blackface social media war. AND - WHY ARE TEETH THE ONLY PART OF THE BODY NOT COVERED BY GOVT HEALTH INSURANCE??

This is Ed as you love him - unfiltered, insightful, thought-provoking and pissed-off at idiots! An FU_Politics Exclusive!

But if you want this to continue, put your money where Ed's mouth is - become a patron at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a boost at Paypal funetworktv@gmail.com

You can find more episodes and other great FU_Politics series wherever you get your podcasts (note: Ed also hosts Mensplaining & Rock 'Em Sock 'Em Politics). Look under FU_POLITICS to find all our great series!

item.title: NOBULLpen - CRITICAL THINKING IS DYING - CAN WE SAVE IT?!
item.itunes:title: NOBULLpen - CRITICAL THINKING IS DYING - CAN WE SAVE IT?!
item.description:
CRITICAL THINKING SKILLS - WHERE DID THEY GO? CAN WE GET THEM BACK?!

If you spend any time on social media you've heard the term 'false equivalency' - well between comparing Don Cherry to Jess Allen to Justin Trudeau, this past week has elevated false equivalency to new heights. But 'false equivalency' is a product of a lack of critical thinking - an inability to think logically in favour of emotional reactions and cheering on your 'team'.

Where did critical thinking go? How did it slip away? How can we get it back? Can we get it back?? And why is critical thinking essential to a functioning democracy?

All important questions. Be prepared to think. Critically.

Host: Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner)

Panelists:

Andrew MacLeod is an award-winning author and currently the legislative bureau chief for the west coast’s premier political website, The Tyee.

Helen Lee Bouygues, the Founder of Reboot Foundation, a non-profit organised that funds researchers with a mission to elevate critical thinking (joins us from Paris, France).

Kyla Lee is a respected & pioneering lawyer with Acumen Law specializing in re-defining DUI laws in British Columbia. A trial lawyer, Kyla knows the importance of critical thinking.

item.content:encoded:
CRITICAL THINKING SKILLS - WHERE DID THEY GO? CAN WE GET THEM BACK?!

If you spend any time on social media you've heard the term 'false equivalency' - well between comparing Don Cherry to Jess Allen to Justin Trudeau, this past week has elevated false equivalency to new heights. But 'false equivalency' is a product of a lack of critical thinking - an inability to think logically in favour of emotional reactions and cheering on your 'team'.

Where did critical thinking go? How did it slip away? How can we get it back? Can we get it back?? And why is critical thinking essential to a functioning democracy?

All important questions. Be prepared to think. Critically.

Host: Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner)

Panelists:

Andrew MacLeod is an award-winning author and currently the legislative bureau chief for the west coast’s premier political website, The Tyee.

Helen Lee Bouygues, the Founder of Reboot Foundation, a non-profit organised that funds researchers with a mission to elevate critical thinking (joins us from Paris, France).

Erica Ifill is the host of the Bad & Bitchy podcast and the author of a very insightful column in Macleans magazine this week about Don Cherry’s lasting effect on hockey in multicultural Canada https://www.macleans.ca/opinion/how-don-cherry-resisted-canadas-brownface/

Kyla Lee is a respected & pioneering lawyer with Acumen Law specializing in re-defining DUI laws in British Columbia. A trial lawyer, Kyla knows the importance of critical thinking.

Hafeez Noorani is a digital marketing consultant and analyst, both of which require skills in synthesizing information from numerous sources, as well as the producer of Mensplaining podcast here on FU_Politics, on which he is also a panelist.

FU_Politics is restoring grassroots, peer-level dialogue between Canadians on politics, current events and issues to promote sensible, insightful, challenging dialogue & debate - while maintaining a sense of humour. No jargon, no pundits. We talk with you, not at you. If you'd like to support this project (instead of surrendering our media to right-wing money & radical Left extremism, subscribe at patreon.com/funetworktv or give us a boost through Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com.

item.title: KEEPING IT REAL - DON CHERRY GOT WHAT HE DESERVED!
item.itunes:title: KEEPING IT REAL - DON CHERRY GOT WHAT HE DESERVED!
item.description:
“Don Cherry is not the disease, he is a symptom – a symptom of a society that has far too long turned a blind eye and silent ear to casual bigotry and hatred in our country. Unfortunately for his career and fortunately for the rest of us, in order to treat this particular disease you must systematically remove the symptoms.” – Michelle Budiwski

Michelle Bidiwski brings us her bold, unbowed takes on current events! In our FU_Politics premiere episode, Michelle pulls no punches on the Don Cherry situation and those still whining about it!

Michelle Budiwski is an author, entrepreneur, educator and social activist who is dedicated to using her own unique experiences and struggles through poverty, abuse, mental illness and addiction to raise awareness and build stronger communities through collaboration, cooperation and open communication. You can find her on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn and her own website (under renovation).

Special thanks to kickfm.ca for making this show possible.

Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring to Canadian media the intelligence, civility, opinions based in fact and a sense of humour that we've been missing! Become a patron, with a monthly donation (whatever you can afford) or a one-time support boost on Paypal! A little goes a long way!

item.title: STEPHEN & STEVEN - WE'RE NOT USA! RELIGION & POLITICS DON'T MIX IN CANADA!
item.itunes:title: STEPHEN & STEVEN - WE'RE NOT USA! RELIGION & POLITICS DON'T MIX IN CANADA!
item.description:
Two things you're not supposed to talk about - Religion & Politics. We talk about both!!!

In America, you can't get elected without declaring your pious religious beliefs (except Trump and we cover that).

In Canada - different story. Political leaders who wear their religion on their sleeve - we're not interested. Just ask Andrew Scheer.

Lots of history, context and insights why mixing religion & politics doesn't appeal to Canadians, just how different Canadians & Americans are on religion (it's a huge gap - and growing) and why there is no legitimate anti-Catholic bias against Andrew Scheer!

Stephen Lautens (@stephenlautens) is a lawyer, political analyst, historian (not the boring kind) and political satirist.

Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner), the creator of Ed the Sock, is a political commentator, satirist and critical-thinking advocate (not the boring kind).

Support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring to Canadian media the intelligence, civility, opinions based in fact and a sense of humour that we've been missing! Become a patron, with a monthly donation (whatever you can afford) or a one-time support boost on Paypal! A little goes a long way!

item.itunes:author: FU Politics

item.title: MENSPLAINING - DOES HOCKEY BREED BULLIES?
item.itunes:title: MENSPLAINING - DOES HOCKEY BREED BULLIES?
item.description:
How about we adults take a break from arguing over Don Cherry & Jess Allen and take a look at one of the valid questions her whiny personal anecdote raised: does junior hockey breed bullies? Probably one of the best shows we've done. Certainly the biggest panel.

Host/Ref: Ed the Sock

Panel:

Michael Landsberg is someone who arguably has talked to more Jocks than anyone in the history of Canada as 18-year host of the sports panel show Off the Record on TSN and now divides his time between co-hosting mornings on TSN 1050 radio in Toronto and his mental health awareness and advocacy group, Sick not Weak.

Nathan Chiarlitti played five years in the Ontario Hockey League with the Sarnia Sting and the Owen Sound Attack, also 3 played 3 seasons St. Francis Xavier University, where he got his Bachelor of Science in Human Kinetics and then played two seasons at McGill University, while completing a Masters of Science in Exercise Physiology. He’s currently a med student at U of Ottawa and wrote a book called More Than a Game, about his time on the ice and the life lessons kids learn playing our national pastime.

Matt Park grew up playing minor league hockey with what was then the MTHL and has an uncle and cousin who made it on the ice in the pro league. He now works in corporate communications, making him one of the few living beings who was able to make an English degree work for him.

Andrew Willis is Andrew Willis. That should be enough introduction. He’s a giant personality with bold opinions & often interesting life experiences we only hear the tip of. He hosts Andyland radio every Wednesday at 10:30PM west coast time on CiTR 101.9 FM. and find it there for streaming too. I don’t know if Andy ever played team sports and if so, what he would define as a team sport.

Paul Marlow has been a fitness trainer for a decade, before which he played high school rugby, volleyball, soccer, baseball and basketball but cut down to only two sports when he was at an American university, and he was drafted by the Toronto Blue Jays but politely declined.

Hafeez Noorani is a digital marketing professional specializing in getting businesses online, which means he's more or less a field pylon when it comes to sports. Though he brings countless years of experience in being picked last in Phys Ed.

If you'd like to support our mission at FU_Politics, restoring to Canadian media the intelligence, civility, opinions based in fact and a sense of humour that we've been missing, consider becoming a patron, with a monthly donation (whatever you can afford) or a one-time gift of support. Going against the grain and building a network from scratch isn't as expensive as it once was - but it still ain't cheap! So consider backing FUN - The FU_Network's FU_Politics programming, where Smartass always starts with Smart.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/funetworktv

Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

Thank you!

item.content:encoded:
How about we adults take a break from arguing over Don Cherry & Jess Allen and take a look at one of the valid questions her whiny personal anecdote raised: does junior hockey breed bullies? Probably one of the best shows we've done. Certainly the biggest panel.

Host/Ref: Ed the Sock

Panel:

Michael Landsberg is someone who arguably has talked to more Jocks than anyone in the history of Canada as 18-year host of the sports panel show Off the Record on TSN and now divides his time between co-hosting mornings on TSN 1050 radio in Toronto and his mental health awareness and advocacy group, Sick not Weak.
