item.title: EP #12 - MATTER OF FACT - BREXIT & WEXIT
item.itunes:title: EP #12 - MATTER OF FACT - BREXIT & WEXIT
item.description:
iReza and Prof S (a UK citizen) talk about the disaster that is Brexit - the history, politics and legal aspects of the decision, as well as drawing parallels with the so-called Wexit movement in Canada. Plus, media and political fails of the week & some topical fact or fictions that has iReza calling foul!

Host: Ishat Reza - http://Twitter.Com/IshatReza

Co-Host: Professor S! - http://Twitter.Com/RCI_101

Matter Of Fact is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour. We talk with you, not at you.

item.itunes:title: EP # 3 - ED THE SOCK'S SHOW ON THE ROAD - DON CHERRY HEAVE-HO! FREE SPEECH! #OKBOOMER
item.description:
You'd think Ed might be sad that yet another controversial Canadian TV icon got the boot from network TV. NOT!

NO TEARS FOR DON CHERRY!

FREE SPEECH - YOU MORONS DON'T KNOW WHAT IT IS!

#OKBOOMER - EXPOSING HYPOCRISY OF THE 'WOKE' CROWD!

Plus more stream-of-consciousness magic as Ed drives into Toronto!

WARNING: CONTAINS FOUL LANGUAGE. AS YOU'D EXPECT!

_________________

item.itunes:title: EP #2 - STEPHEN & STEVEN - DON CHERRY FIRING & FREE SPEECH!
item.description:
How the firing of controversial hockey sportscaster Don Cherry revealed Canadians' ignorance of what 'free speech' & 'free expression' rights REALLY mean and what rights they REALLY have! And why giving Cherry the heave-ho was a giant step forward for Canada!

Hosts:

Stephen Lautens (@stephenlautens) lawyer, columnist, history buff

Steven Kerzner (@stevenjkerzner) TV & radio broadcaster, commentator, satirist and political gadfly

item.itunes:title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - MAX FAWCETT - CDN POLITICAL PR PPL ARE COWARDS!
item.description:
FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - THIS IS VANCOLOUR WITH MO AMIR

In this episode, Max talks to note political journalist and adviser Max Fawcett about the cynicism, failure & culture of political communications in Canada!

Max Fawcett is a freelance writer and the former editor of Alberta Oil magazine and Vancouver Magazine. He’s written for The Globe & Mail, The Walrus, The Tyee, and other publications. He previously worked in Alberta’s Climate Change office. He obtained his BA from the University of British Columbia and his MA from Carleton University, both in political science.

Follow Max Fawcett on Twitter https://Twitter.Com/MaxFawcett

Subscribe to This is VANCOLOUR on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
Follow Mo Amir on Twitter - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour
And check him out as a frequent guest on #FU_Politics!
No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.
After listening you'll know why Canada needs #FU_Politics - real talk about real issues with real people from a politically moderate position! Not another right-wing media outlet or racist group funded by hidden dark money! And you'll finally give in to your conscience & support our work as a subscriber at http://Patreon.com/funetworktv or one-time supporter at Paypal through funetworktv@gmail.com! C'mon - cough it up!

item.title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - TOP DUI LAWYER KYLA LEE
item.itunes:title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - TOP DUI LAWYER KYLA LEE
item.description:
an FU_POLITICS SPECIAL PRESENTATION

THIS IS VANCOLOUR WITH MO AMIR

SPECIAL GUEST: KYLA LEE

Kyla Lee is a criminal lawyer with expertise in impaired driving and immediate roadside prohibition for Acumen Law Corporation.

She is renowned for her knowledge of the immediate roadside prohibition (IRP) scheme. In 2014, she was the first lawyer to explain the deficiencies of the IRP scheme to the judges at the Supreme Court.

She obtained her law degree at the University of British Columbia. Currently, she is a member of the Trial Lawyers Association of BC, the Canadian Bar Association, and the founder of the Canadian Impaired Driving Lawyers Association.

Kyla was named one of Canadian Lawyer Magazine’s Top 25 Most Influential Lawyers in Canada. She’s appeared on GlobalBC, The Lynda Steele Show, CBC News, CTV, and a variety of other outlets seeking her criminal law expertise. She also used to be a model!

Follow Kyla Lee on Twitter: https://Twitter.Com/IRPlawyer

Subscribe to This is VANCOLOUR on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
Follow Mo Amir on Twitter - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour
And check him out as a frequent guest on #FU_Politics!
No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.
After listening you'll know why Canada needs #FU_Politics - real talk about real issues with real people from a politically moderate position! item.title: EP #2 - CANADIAN POLITIQUE - SIN & "EWWW...DAD!!!"
item.itunes:title: EP #2 - CANADIAN POLITIQUE - SIN & "EWWW...DAD!!!"
item.description:
With Andrew Scheer refusing to say whether he believes being gay is a sin, we decide to tell you what it means. We also discuss the departure of Elizabeth May as Green Party Leader and the truly bizarre, disgusting and misogynistic fascination Rapper T.I. has with his daughter's virginity.

Panelists are the usual suspects -

Cameron Bishop
Lee-Anne Goodman
Mike MacDougall
Enjoy!

CANADIAN POLITIQUE

Cameron Bishop, a former Liberal staffer on Parliament Hill, along with co-hosts Lee-Anne Goodman, former Canadian Press White House Correspondent during the Obama Administration, and Mike MacDougall, a lover of all things political and historical talk politics in Canada, the U.S. and worldwide, and interview activists, politicians and others, giving you their unvarnished opinions about life, politics and everything in between. It’s a progressive pod -- if you’re of the conservative persuasion, your annoyance is welcome.

Follow Cameron on Twitter - http://Twitter.Com/Ottawa_Cameron

Follow Lee-Anne on Twitter - https://Twitter.Com/LeeAnne25

Follow Mike on Twitter - https://twitter.com/Mike_Macdougall

Follow @CdnPolitique on Twitter - https://Twitter.Com/CdnPolitique

Listen to past episodes of CDN POLITIQUE @ https://canadianpolitique.simplecast.com/ or on iTunes, etc.

CANADIAN POLITIQUE is the newest addition to the #FU_Politics Podcast Channel

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.

item.title: EP #13 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS - GREEN PARTY - GO AWAY?! SCHEER WON'T GO! EPSTEIN FIGHT! MORE!
item.itunes:title: EP #13 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS - GREEN PARTY - GO AWAY?! SCHEER WON'T GO! EPSTEIN FIGHT! MORE!
item.description:
Probably the biggest brawl in our network's (short) history - and it happens over the dumbest of stories then spreads into a fight about responsible journalism!

Plus:

Andrew Scheer just won't go away

Elizabeth May quits as Green Party leader - should we care and why does Green Party still exist anyway?

Raving racist Richard Spencer revealed as a raving racist! Nice suit & tie though, it got him mainstreamed on CNN.

Epstein - new evidence of homocide? THIS one turns into the donnybrook over responsible journalism! Ed lays the smackdown on a panelist!

Host: Ed the Sock - http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock

Panel:

Lauren Griffith - http://Twitter.Com/HalAndLolo

Mo Amir - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour

David K - http://Twitter.Com/TheRealTheDavey

Stuart Benson - http://Twitter.Com/LeftHandStu

_________________

item.title: EP #2 - ED THE SOCK'S SHOW ON THE ROAD - WHY ANTIFA ISN'T REAL + MORE
item.itunes:title: EP #2 - ED THE SOCK'S SHOW ON THE ROAD - WHY ANTIFA ISN'T REAL + MORE
item.description:
Ed continues goin' down the road, driving in downtown Toronto, sharing musings about things that may make you laugh, piss you off or make you think or, most likely, all three! And chances are, he's saying what you're thinking.

Topics include:

Why Antifa isn't a real thing

White Supremacists aren't actually political conservatives

The good news about racism

Stupid gentrification of stores & pubs & places

Why the past wasn't better... AND MORE

Why "Gilligan's Island" should be taught alongside Shakespeare, Ed's current favourite and least-favourite TV shows, what the letters HBO really stand for...honestly, the list is too long. Just listen.

_________________

You're a passenger in Ed's car - so ante up for your share of gas! Support the show & #FU_Politics by becoming a patron at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or give our battery a boost with Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com

_________________

item.itunes:title: EP #1 - ED THE SOCK'S SHOW ON THE ROAD - ELIZABETH MAY, BATHS ARE DISGUSTING, GILLIGAN'S ISLAND, ETC.
item.description:
Ed the Sock's stream-of-consciousness opinions and musings as he drives from home to Toronto meetings. Like James Joyce's Ulysses on four wheels. Actually recorded while driving and yes, we don't recommend you do this, safety, blah blah blah, but Ed vents his spleen (and curses other drivers & Toronto roadways) when he's driving all the time anyway, so this is just adding a recording device.

Topics include - Elizabeth May - who cares? Green Party - go away! That dumb glare male drivers give each other when passing, why baths are disgusting vs showers and more!

And keep Ed's gas tank full for more drives - support FU_Politics at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com

item.title: EP #11 - MENSPLAINING - MALE OR FEMALE BOSS - WHO WOULD YOU CHOOSE & WHY?
item.itunes:title: EP #11 - MENSPLAINING - MALE OR FEMALE BOSS - WHO WOULD YOU CHOOSE & WHY?
item.description:
Here's another topic title that will get angry response from people who haven't listened to a word of the podcast.

As a man, would you rather have a male or female boss? Why? Who have been your best & worst bosses - men or women?

We discuss this and the polls, stats and societal issue s that impact the male & female bosses of the world as well as share some tales of inspirational leadership and some real horror stories.

_________________

Host: Steven Kerzner (subbing for Ed the Sock) - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Panel:

Hafeez Noorani - http://Twitter.Com/FeezyDoesIt

Ryan Ballantine (NEW panelist) - http://Twitter.Com/BBCANRyan

Andrew Willis - http://Twitter.Com/AndyLandRadio

Sean Wilton - http://Twitter.Com/CredibleHulk4

item.title: EP #1 - STEPHEN & STEVEN - WAS THIS UGLY ELECTION THE NEW NORMAL?
item.itunes:title: EP #1 - STEPHEN & STEVEN - WAS THIS UGLY ELECTION THE NEW NORMAL?
item.description:
Lies. Slander. Dirty Tricks. Dark Money. There was plenty of that this past election. Truth? Issues? Buried under the muck.

Are we in for more US-style elections full of bile and empty of substance? Will a new Conservative leader change their divisive tactics? Will we see our elections return to being more...Canadian?

Stephen Lautens & Steven Kerzner explore the issue with informed opinion, insights and yes, a good sense of humour. Because it's better to laugh than cry.

NEW SHOW!

_________________

Pry media control from the hands of deep-pocket, right-wing manipulators & sanctimonious, impractical left-wing radicals. Support FU_Politics - a voice for all Canadians who haven't drank anyone's Kool-Aid. Support us at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or Paypal at funetworktv@gmail.com

_________________

item.title: EP #16 - The NO BULLpen - Trans Rights vs Free Speech
item.itunes:title: EP #16 - The NO BULLpen - Trans Rights vs Free Speech
item.description:
Megan Murphy. Toronto Public Library. Google them to read about the clash between 'free-speech' advocates and LGBTQ+ community over letting a known transphobic speaker do her thing on city-owned property.

Is a person's right to free speech more important than the damage that speech may cause? In Canada, the Charter of Rights & Freedoms says no. Most people don't know this - nor have a firm grasp of what 'the right to free speech' actually refers to.

Does a woman espousing transphobic comments have a "right" to speak at a city-owned venue, or is her speech and its contribution to real violence against human beings being the kind of thing that the Charter meant about imposing "reasonable limits" to spouting off opinions?

Is refusing to allow a transphobe a platform in a city-owned building a slippery-slope to the wholesale loss of everyone's freedom to express opinions that are generally unpopular and inaccurate? That's this episode's debate.

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Panel:

Charlie Eau, a trans non-binary advocate for LGBTQ+ rights in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

Samantha Emann, a news editor with Torstar Corporation with her finger on the pulse of news & opinions. - https://Twitter.Com/smemann

Graeme Frisque, a free speech advocate and city hall & politics reporter for the Brampton Guardian and Mississauga News. - https://Twitter.Com/GraemeFrisque

Support our honest, no jargon, pundit-free and BS-free program and all of FU_Politics via a subscription at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or one-time boost via Paypal at funetworktv@gmail.com

The NO BULLpen is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

item.title: EP #10 - MENSPLAINING - DOES RECYCLING MAKE YOU GAY?
item.itunes:title: EP #10 - MENSPLAINING - DOES RECYCLING MAKE YOU GAY?
item.description:
That's a frikkin' stupid question. But that was the headline on numerous articles based on "a study in new journal Sex Roles, a 2018 US federal report led by Pennsylvania State University psychologist Janet Swim, has found participants assessing eco-friendly activity would be more likely to question the sexuality of a man who engaged in things they saw as more “feminine” green behaviours."

So it's a dumb question. But listen to how dumb headlines lead to an interesting discussion about the strong messages men still receive about what's "MANLY" -- and what isn't. Plus, one of our panelists gets urgent legal advice on the show that he wasn't looking for! Man, the things we pack into one episode!

Host - Ed the Sock - http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock

Panel:

Hafeez Noorani, producer of Mensplaining and Digital Strategy & Content Consultant - http://Twitter.Com/FeezyDoesIt

Paul Doroshenko - He has 'Q.C.' after his name, which means he's a lawyer, but not just any lawyer - a criminal defense lawyer. Just like the ones you see on TV shows! But he's real and a brand-new panelist! Welcome! - http://Twitter.Com/PaulDoroshenko

Andrew Willis - Host of "Andyland Radio" on CiTR radio available online anytime at https://andylandradio.com/. And he may or may not have some issues with dollar-store picture frames. - http://Twitter.Com/AndyLandRadio

Kyle Gunderson - Kyle's a software development expert from Saskatoon, so you understand why he needs the excitement of this show in his life! Plus he's our most excellent webmaster at http://FUNetwork.TV - a real whiz. That means "ace, expert", not a slang term for urination. - http://Twitter.Com/KyleGunderson

Support our show and our network - restoring real talk by real people about real things - but in an entertaining way, not like those other crappy, dry corporate podcast networks! Become a patron at Patreon.com/funetworktv or support us via Paypal at funetworktv@gmail.com

item.title: EP #9 - The KERZNER EXPEDITION - CHARLES ADLER - CANADA'S CONSERVATIVE PARTY HAS LOST ITS SOUL
item.itunes:title: EP #9 - The KERZNER EXPEDITION - CHARLES ADLER - CANADA'S CONSERVATIVE PARTY HAS LOST ITS SOUL
item.description:
It actually made him cry. On national TV.

On an election eve TV broadcast, prominent conservative TV & radio broadcaster Charles Adler could no longer deny to himself or anyone else that the Conservative Party he had supported for decades was gone. No longer socially progressive and fiscally conservative, the present Conservative Party of Canada is home to "...extremists...Islamophobes...white nationalists or white supremacists...misogynists. The usual suspects of people who we choose not to associate with."

And it made him cry. His political home was gone.

What finally brought Charles to this realization? The answer is sincere & emotional - both things modern Conservative Party members frown upon.

When did the conservative movement in Canada lose its soul and can it be reclaimed? Steven and Charles talk about this and other related topics important to progressives, conservatives and our country.

Charles Adler is an Emmy Award-winning TV & radio broadcaster with decades of experience in Canada and the United States and an iconic voice of rational, reasonable conservative thought. His radio program, Charles Adler Tonight, is heard weekdays on Global News Radio (and, of course, also available at all times on the internet).

The Kerzner Expedition is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

item.content:encoded:
It actually made him cry. On national TV.

On an election eve TV broadcast, prominent conservative TV & radio broadcaster Charles Adler could no longer deny to himself or anyone else that the Conservative Party he had supported for decades was gone. No longer socially progressive and fiscally conservative, the present Conservative Party of Canada is home to "...extremists...Islamophobes...white nationalists or white supremacists...misogynists. The usual suspects of people who we choose not to associate with."

And it made him cry. His political home was gone.

What finally brought Charles to this realization? The answer is sincere & emotional - both things modern Conservative Party members frown upon.

When did the conservative movement in Canada lose its soul and can it be reclaimed? Steven and Charles talk about this and other related topics important to progressives, conservatives and our country.

Charles Adler is an Emmy Award-winning TV & radio broadcaster with decades of experience in Canada and the United States and an iconic voice of rational, reasonable conservative thought. His radio program, Charles Adler Tonight, is heard weekdays on Global News Radio (and, of course, also available at all times on the internet).

The Kerzner Expedition is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour. item.description:
Election 2019 - IT'S FINALLY OVER!! Cameron, Lee-Anne and Mike talk the results of the 43rd federal election, the misogynistic attacks against Environment Minister Catherine McKenna and what to expect with a minority Parliament.

CANADIAN POLITIQUE

Cameron Bishop, a former Liberal staffer on Parliament Hill, along with co-hosts Lee-Anne Goodman, former Canadian Press White House Correspondent during the Obama Administration, and Mike MacDougall, a lover of all things political and historical talk politics in Canada, the U.S. and worldwide, and interview activists, politicians and others, giving you their unvarnished opinions about life, politics and everything in between. It’s a progressive pod -- if you’re of the conservative persuasion, your annoyance is welcome.

Follow Cameron on Twitter - http://Twitter.Com/Ottawa_Cameron

Follow Lee-Anne on Twitter - https://Twitter.Com/LeeAnne25

item.title: EP #11 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS - ELECTION 2019 WAS A S***SHOW!
item.itunes:title: EP #11 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS - ELECTION 2019 WAS A S***SHOW!
item.description:
Face it - Election 2019 was a shitshow! Endless lies from an unscrupulous party, media chasing clickbait not stories, no discussion of real issues, hate site asshats elevated to 'journalists'...the list goes on!

Ed unleashes his fury on the people & parties responsible for making this the stupidest, worst-reported, ugliest, most lie-filled campaign ever! Plus reveals his solution for fixing the system - and it involves TV shows!

Panel:

Sarbjit Kaur is a communications strategist with KPW communications who worked in the McGuinty government and has worked on more than a dozen, federal, municipal and provincial election campaigns since then. - https://twitter.com/sarbjitkaur1

Bobby Umar is a professional speaker and business coach, who has spoken at TEDx 5 times. He is also a social media influencer and an expert on authentic connection, employee engagement and thought leadership. - https://twitter.com/raehanbobby

Kyle Gunderson is the saviour of http://funetwork.tv - quite literally. He grew up in a town of 400 people in Saskatchewan, so basically he had to hide he was gay until he moved to the big smoke in Saskatoon, where he now resides. He's worked in mining, resources, engineering and consulting for 6 years "in a past life" before settling into his current job as a software product developer. - http://Twitter.Com/KyleGunderson

Stuart Benson journalist, editor and self-described "Leftist Dirtbag" - we know him and love him, an #FU_Politics regular panelist - http://Twitter.Com/LeftHandStu

Support this show and FU_Politics by subscribing as a patron at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or show support through Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS with ED THE SOCK! is an #FU_Politics Podcast

Subscribe on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/funetwork

Follow Ed The Sock on:
http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock
http://Instagram.Com/Ed_The_Sock
https://Facebook.com/edthesock.funetworktv/

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour

item.title: EP #8 - The KERZNER EXPEDITION - TALEEB VS JWR CAGE MATCH!
item.itunes:title: EP #8 - The KERZNER EXPEDITION - TALEEB VS JWR CAGE MATCH!
item.description:
He's got a solid record of community involvement at the highest levels, care for the needy, a business background and graduated from Princeton & Yale. Taleeb Noormohamed is a smart guy. So why would he want to run as the new Liberal candidate against former Attorney-General and deified avatar of truth, newly independent (read: kicked out) candidate Jody Wilson-Raybould?

The local race, like many around the country, is neck-and-neck.

Steven talks to Taleeb about why he chose to run, what his values are, his feelings about black/brownface, facing real racism and the feeling among constituents that issues that matter to their community have been sidelined in favour of the JWR circus. Also, why an independent MP may as well be an empty seat.

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Taleeb On Twitter: https://twitter.com/Taleeb

Support honest, frank, insightful & funny political content, the kind that speaks the way you speak and talks with you, not at you. Become a monthly patron at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or Paypal at funetworktv@gmail.com. Or else the big billion-dollar media companies will control what you see & hear. Them and The Rebel. I know you don't want that.

The Kerzner Expedition is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast
No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.

item.itunes:summary: He's got a solid record of community involvement at the highest levels, care for the needy, a business background and graduated from Princeton & Yale. Taleeb Noormohamed is a smart guy. So why would he want to run as the new Liberal candidate against former Attorney-General and deified avatar of truth, newly independent (read: kicked out) candidate Jody Wilson-Raybould?The local race, like many around the country, is neck-and-neck.Steven talks to Taleeb about why he chose to run, what his values are, his feelings about black/brownface, facing real racism and the feeling among constituents that issues that matter to their community have been sidelined in favour of the JWR circus. Also, why an independent MP may as well be an empty seat.Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerznerTaleeb On Twitter: https://twitter.com/Taleeb Support honest, frank, insightful & funny political content, the kind that speaks the way you speak and talks with you, not at you. item.title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - SCHEER'S TRANS 'CURE'
item.itunes:title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - SCHEER'S TRANS 'CURE'
item.description:
Laura Budd is a Canadian, active in her community, and happened one afternoon to bump into her MP (at the time) Andrew Scheer. She asked him a question about whether he'd protect trans rights. His answer: he wants to 'cure' them.

He said he opposes Gay Conversion 'Therapy'. Apparently he supports Trans Conversion 'Therapy'?

Short interview, but important look into the mind of the man who wants to be our national leader.

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

After listening you'll know why Canada needs #FU_Politics - real talk about real issues with real people from a politically moderate position! Not another right-wing media outlet or racist group funded by hidden dark money! And you'll finally give in to your conscience & support our work as a subscriber at http://Patreon.com/funetworktv or one-time supporter at Paypal through funetworktv@gmail.com!

item.title: EP #15 - The NO_BULLPen - HEADING FOR A CANADIAN CIVIL WAR?!
item.itunes:title: EP #15 - The NO_BULLPen - HEADING FOR A CANADIAN CIVIL WAR?!
item.description:
Liberals and Conservatives are neck-and-neck in the polls. If Liberals get most number of seats, but not a majority, they form a Minority Government.

If the Conservatives get most number of seats, but not a majority - The Liberals may still become the next government!

Facts: Trudeau is PM until he resigns or is dismissed by the Governor-General. If he says he intends to form a government with help of smaller parties, or if Governor-General determines the Conservatives, even with highest seat count, can't effectively gain confidence of the House, Trudeau would remain PM - even if the Liberals win fewer seats than the Cons.

It's all legal, proper and constitutional. We've just never experienced in our lifetimes (last time was 1919). Canadians won't understand what happened. And Scheer & his partisans will be apoplectic! If you think they fought dirty and misrepresented facts DURING the election (they did) wait'll you see the Conservatives when they are denied government!

The rhetoric, the lies, the rage - it'll go to 11. And may rip this country apart.

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Panelists:

Ishat Reza, Harvard grad, lawyer & governance expert and host of "Matter of Fact" on FU_Politics - http://Twitter.Com/ishat_reza

Steve Cole, socially liberal conservative oil-patch worker from Alberta and new panelist -

Stuart Benson, journalist, editor and self-described "Leftist Dirtbag" - http://Twitter.Com/LeftHandStu

Support free, frank, honest and funny political content - become a subscriber of #FU_Politics at http://patreon.com/funetworktv or Paypal - funetworktv@gmail.com!

Buy your Ed the Sock t-shirts, hats, mugs, and more at http://funetwork.tv/shop

The NO BULLpen is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.

item.title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K’s “LEVEL WITH HER” - “QUEST FOR GLORY” & “HERO-U” CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 4 of 4
item.itunes:title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K’s “LEVEL WITH HER” - “QUEST FOR GLORY” & “HERO-U” CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 4 of 4
item.description:
In the final episode of this discussion with Lori Cole, 30-year gaming veteran and co-creator of the classic, ground-breaking Quest For Glory series of games as well as the current Hero-U franchise, she talks with Liana Kerzner about her newest game, being inspired by Japanese-style adventure games, and choice in video games. Support the Kickstarter for her latest game at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/transolargames/summer-daze-at-hero-u

Level With Her is a series of in-depth conversations with video game developers, like an Inside The Actors Studio for video games, created & hosted by video game authority, journalist & university lecturer Liana Kerzner.

Subscribe To Liana K on Youtube: https://Youtube.Com/user/LianaK

Follow Lori Cole on Twitter: https://Twitter.Com/Hero_Lori

Follow Liana K on Twitter: http://Twitter.Com/RedLianaK

Listen on iTunes and Subscribe! https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/level-with-her-quest-for-glory-hero-u-co-creator-lori-cole/id1472299923?i=1000453252577

On Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/3LkX9fVCpcgEfJNisvQjXa

iHeart Radio: https://www.iheart.com/podcast/269-fu-politics-48983352/episode/level-with-her-quest-for-50850250/

Youtube: https://youtu.be/sknL63AV7vw

PodBean: https://fupolitics.podbean.com/e/level-with-her-quest-for-glory-hero-u-co-creator-lori-cole/

item.title: EP #14 - The NO BULLpen - DISASTERS! FINAL WORD ON LIBERAL, CPC & NDP CAMPAIGNS
item.itunes:title: EP #14 - The NO BULLpen - DISASTERS! FINAL WORD ON LIBERAL, CPC & NDP CAMPAIGNS
item.description:
The 2019 Canadian election was not only the ugliest one in memory, it was also a field guide on how NOT to run a campaign. ALL of them - Liberal, Conservative and NDP! Though one of them was, in the opinion of host Steven Kerzner, "brilliant" in how it used ugliness & disaster to make unwarranted gains.

You will hear many media discussions about the 3 main parties' campaigns. But none of them will be this blunt, honest & brutal. And damned funny.

Host: Steven Kerzner

Panel:

Andrew McLeod - Legislative Bureau Chief, thetyee.com (Victoria, BC) - https://twitter.com/A_MacLeod_Tyee

Hafeez Noorani - Digital content & marketing consultant and producer of MENSPLAINING podcast on FU_Politics (Vancouver BC) - https://twitter.com/FEEZYDoesIT

Michelle Bidiwski - political commentator & podcaster (NEW panelist) from Brandon, Manitoba - https://twitter.com/Butterflymbca

Mo Amir - host of the popular THIS IS VANCOLOUR podcast. (Vancouver BC) - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour

Support frank, honest, funny political shows that cut through the BS with jargon-free insight you won't find anywhere else! Subscribe as a patron at http://Patreon.com/funetworktv or contribute via Paypal at funetworktv@gmail.com

The NO BULLpen is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.

item.title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K's "LEVEL WITH HER" - "QUEST FOR GLORY" & "HERO-U" CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 3 of 4
item.itunes:title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K's "LEVEL WITH HER" - "QUEST FOR GLORY" & "HERO-U" CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 3 of 4
item.description:
Level With Her is a series of in-depth conversations with video game developers, like an Inside The Actors Studio for video games. In part 3 of 4 of a discussion with Lori Cole, 30-year gaming veteran, and co-creator of the Quest For Glory series of games and the current Hero-U franchise. In this part Liana Kerzner & Lori talk about being a "Woman In Gaming" (It's not what you think), female playable characters, continuing to take risks, and why she didn't just make another Quest For Glory style game!

Lori has a Kickstarter running NOW for the newest game from her company - info & support here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/transolargames/summer-daze-at-hero-u

Subscribe To Liana K on Youtube: https://Youtube.Com/user/LianaK

Follow Lori Cole on Twitter: https://Twitter.Com/Hero_Lori

Follow Liana K on Twitter: http://Twitter.Com/RedLianaK

Listen on iTunes and Subscribe! https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/level-with-her-quest-for-glory-hero-u-co-creator-lori-cole/id1472299923?i=1000453252577

On Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/3LkX9fVCpcgEfJNisvQjXa

iHeart Radio: https://www.iheart.com/podcast/269-fu-politics-48983352/episode/level-with-her-quest-for-50850250/

Youtube: https://youtu.be/sknL63AV7vw

PodBean: https://fupolitics.podbean.com/e/level-with-her-quest-for-glory-hero-u-co-creator-lori-cole/

Google Podcasts: https://tinyurl.com/y4qoeff3

item.title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K's "LEVEL WITH HER" - "QUEST FOR GLORY" & "HERO-U" CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 2 of 4
item.itunes:title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K's "LEVEL WITH HER" - "QUEST FOR GLORY" & "HERO-U" CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 2 of 4
item.description:
In part two, Liana continues her discussion with Lori Cole, 30-year gaming veteran, and co-creator of the Quest For Glory series of games, as well as the current Hero-U franchise. In this part she talks about team Dungeons and Dragons-style business management, what it was like working with Sierra On-Line, how the internet has changed things for video game developers, and furries.

Lori has a Kickstarter running NOW for the newest game from her company - info & support here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/transolargames/summer-daze-at-hero-u

item.title: #9 - MENSPLAINING - PROUD BOYS, INCELS - WHAT'S THEIR FRIKKIN' PROBLEM?!
item.itunes:title: #9 - MENSPLAINING - PROUD BOYS, INCELS - WHAT'S THEIR FRIKKIN' PROBLEM?!
item.description:
There's no shortage of boutique hate groups for men to join - from racist Proud Boys to women-hating Incels. What's their frikkin' problem? Why are these men so full of rage, piss & vinegar? Is it crippling fear? Weren't hugged enough? Too much chess-club? Are they just a bunch of whiny asshats or is there something to their feelings of disenfranchisement?

Hey, did you know you can take credit for us making more shows? You can if you support us with subscriptions of $1, $5, $10...sky's the limit. And so is the potential of this network to take back the type of media Canadians had taken from us. FU - For Us. Be part of the us. Just go to http://Patreon.Com/funetworktv and you can Give Us Money! You can also do it at Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

item.title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K's "LEVEL WITH HER" - "QUEST FOR GLORY" & "HERO-U" CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 1 of 4
item.itunes:title: #FU_VIDEOGAMES PREVIEW! - LIANA K's "LEVEL WITH HER" - "QUEST FOR GLORY" & "HERO-U" CO-CREATOR LORI COLE - Part 1 of 4
item.description:
Level With Her is like an Inside The Actors Studio for video games - insightful, frank and funny conversations with video game developers!

In this debut episode, Liana Kerzner talks to a legend, Quest for Glory & Hero-U co-creator Lori Cole. A 30-year gaming veteran, Lori talks about her specialized way of designing games that have endured for decades, why she hates the BioWare dialogue wheel and what it's like to have a game series old enough to have graduated college!

Part 1 of 4!

Lori has a Kickstarter running NOW for the newest game from her company - info & support here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/transolargames/summer-daze-at-hero-u

item.title: FU_POLITICS 101 - PARLIAMENTARY PRIVILEGE: WHAT IS IT? WHAT IS IT NOT?
item.itunes:title: FU_POLITICS 101 - PARLIAMENTARY PRIVILEGE: WHAT IS IT? WHAT IS IT NOT?
item.description:
Steven Kerzner speaks to Hon. Marlene Jennings about Parliamentry Privilege, an issue that was a big one in Election 2019 before...other...stories took its place. But Canadians are still left not knowing what PP is, beyond what the media ( biased and unbiased), political parties and uninformed loudmouths on the internet tell them it is,

Is Parliamentary Privilege designed to hide secrets of government misdeeds? Or is it there to protect the public? And in denying some testimony to happen during the SNC affair using PP (I know, pee pee, move on), did the Privy Council act to cover the ass of Prime Minister Trudeau or is PM JT quietly taking slings & arrows to protect innocent Canadians from being dragged into murky matters they don't deserve to be?

Hon. Marlene Jennings is the former Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister for International Cooperation and the former Parliamentary Secretary to the Solicitor General of Canada. From 2004 to October 2005, she was Parliamentary Secretary to the Prime Minister with special emphasis on Canada-U.S. relations. (Wikipedia)

Follow Marlene Jennings On Twitter: https://Twitter.Com/MarleneJennings

Follow Steven J. Kerzner On Twitter: https://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Support #FU_Politics!

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.
After listening you'll know why Canada needs #FU_Politics - real talk about real issues with real people from a politically moderate position! Not another right-wing media outlet or racist group funded by hidden dark money! And you'll finally give in to your conscience & support our work as a subscriber at http://Patreon.com/funetworktv or one-time supporter at Paypal through funetworktv@gmail.com! C'mon - cough it up!

item.itunes:title: EP #10 - MATTER OF FACT - POLLS WHEN CAN YOU TRUST THEM? PLUS - HOT RIDING RACES!
item.description:
How are Election polls like Horosocopes - they are only randomly accurate! Horoscopes are bunk but there's science behind polls, so what makes them so often unreliable? PLUS Ishat and Professor S dig into this elections highly-contested (and important) hot ridings and bring you election-related media & political fails PLUS PLUS 2 fact or fictions.

Host: Ishat Reza - http://Twitter.Com/Ishat_Reza

item.title: EP #6 - ZODCAST - FAKE RESUMES, FAUX JOURNALISTS, CANADA DIVIDED & AUTISM SERVICES EMERGENCY!
item.itunes:title: EP #6 - ZODCAST - FAKE RESUMES, FAUX JOURNALISTS, CANADA DIVIDED & AUTISM SERVICES EMERGENCY!
item.description:
Neil and Lauren pad their resumes (it's trendy!) and rail against journalists who become the story. Neil and his guest, FU_Politics panelist and host of hit podcast This Is Vancolour Mo Amir discuss division in Canada, the view on the left coast, crony capitalism and political leadership PLUS Neil and Greg MacEachern discuss lies and fake insurance brokers - and Greg admonishes Neil for name calling. Finally, Autism activist @AlineSociology discuss what an effective nation autism strategy would look like, being abandoned by your government and misogynistic Twitter trolls.

Host: Neil Waytowich - http://Twitter.Com/ThatsMrNeil

Co-host: Lauren Griffith - http://Twitter.Com/HalandLolo

Keep Zodcast & the other important #FU_Politics people-centered political programs going - support with a subscription at patreon.com/funetworktv or an one-time gift through Paypal, address is funetworktv@gmail.com! item.title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - POPULISM & POLITICAL EXTREMISM IN CANADA - IT'S REAL!
item.itunes:title: FU_POLITICS SPECIAL - POPULISM & POLITICAL EXTREMISM IN CANADA - IT'S REAL!
item.description:
AN FU_Politics Special Presentation -Populism and political extremism in Canada! Yes - in Canada! And Maxime Bernier's People's Party of Canada is a part of it (a small part; let's face it, they can hold a rally in a phone booth). Star Vancouver's political journalist Melanie Green talks to our own Mo Amir on his popular west-coast based podcast This is VANCOLOUR!
Subscribe to This is VANCOLOUR on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
Follow Mo Amir on Twitter - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour
And check him out as a frequent guest on #FU_Politics!
No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.
After listening you'll know why Canada needs #FU_Politics - real talk about real issues with real people from a politically moderate position! Not another right-wing media outlet or racist group funded by hidden dark money! And you'll finally give in to your conscience & support our work as a subscriber at http://Patreon.com/funetworktv or one-time supporter at Paypal through funetworktv@gmail.com! C'mon - cough it up!

item.title: EP #8 - MENSPLAINING - DOES SAYING "SORRY" MAKE YOU LESS OF A MAN?
item.itunes:title: EP #8 - MENSPLAINING - DOES SAYING "SORRY" MAKE YOU LESS OF A MAN?
item.description:
Like Elton John sings, "Sorry seems to be the hardest word."

But does it make it hard to get hard too? Does apologizing impair a man's masculinity? Make you weak, effeminate, a loser?

Or is the ability to apologize a very "manly" quality?

And are there times when it's more admirable NOT to apologize?

Also, forgiveness. Is it 'girly-man' to grant forgiveness or the act of a mature male?

And during this podcast, panelist Andrew Willis does something which MAY be unforgivable!

Host: Ed the Sock - http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock

Panelists:

Hafeez Noorani - Producer of "Mensplaining", digital content and marketing expert. http://Twitter.Com/FeezyDoesIt

Andrew Willis - Host of "Andyland Radio with Andrew Willis" streaming on andylandradio.com Wednesdays 10:30PM -12:30AM PST. http://Twitter.Com/AndyLandRadio

Justin D. Whitehead - he has very impressive credentials, we just forgot what they are this moment. http://Twitter.Com/OriginalJDW

Sean Wilton - NEW PANELIST! http://Twitter.Com/CredibleHulk4

Hey, did you know you can take credit for us making more shows? You can if you support us with subscriptions of $1, $5, $10...sky's the limit. And so is the potential of this network to take back the type of media Canadians had taken from us. FU - For Us. Be part of the us. Just go to http://Patreon.Com/funetworktv and you can Give Us Money! You can also do it at Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

MENSPLAINING is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.

item.title: EP #13 - The NO BULLpen - PHONY WHITE OUTRAGE & REAL FRANK TALK ABOUT REAL RACISM!
item.itunes:title: EP #13 - The NO BULLpen - PHONY WHITE OUTRAGE & REAL FRANK TALK ABOUT REAL RACISM!
item.description:
Blackface, Aladdin-face - People of Colour seem to be reacting with perspective, thoughtful insight and forgiveness while white Lefties LOSE THEIR SH*T!

White "Outrage' is nothing more than hypocrisy by people who know what they were thinking & doing 20 years ago, it wasn't so lily-white, and their grand opera is making a mockery of real racism, says host Steven Kerzner.

And our panelists, all people of colour from different backgrounds, talk about the real, tangible, casual racism they experience all the time that nobody in the media talks about.

Except us!

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Panel:

Hafeez Noorani - http://Twitter.Com/FeezyDoesIt

Mohammed ("Mo") Amir - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour

Lauren Griffith - http://Twitter.Com/HalandLolo

item.itunes:title: EP #9 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS: WTF IS "INTERNALIZED MISOGYNY" PLUS GRETA THUNBERG: MEDIA TOY?
item.description:
Never heard of "internalized misogyny"? It's the term radical (we stress radical) feminists use to insult & infantilize women who make choices the radfems don't approve of. Yeah, bunch of BS and we talk about it - also about why Ed's classic TV show Ed & Red's Night Party was a more real example of feminism than the type radfems preach.

Also - is environmental activist Greta Thunberg yet another young activist the media plays with for a while then tosses aside like an old toy?

Host: Ed the Sock - http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock

Panel:

Lex Gore - http://Twitter.Com/LexGoreAdaptiv

Stuart "Dirtbag Leftist" Benson - http://Twitter.Com/LeftHandStu

Justin D. Whitehead (what does the "D" stand for this week?) - http://Twitter.Com/OriginalJDW

item.title: EP #12 - The NO BULLpen - BLACKFACE, BROWNFACE, RED-FACED TRUDEAU - NOW WHAT?
item.itunes:title: EP #12 - The NO BULLpen - BLACKFACE, BROWNFACE, RED-FACED TRUDEAU - NOW WHAT?
item.description:
So he's human after all. Justin Trudeau did dumb things when he was younger just like everyone else. Should apologized-for mistakes from 2 decades ago cost Trudeau re-election, when Conservative Party leader Andrew Scheer compared gay people to dogs in 2006 and has NOT apologized? Who are we punishing - Trudeau or the country?

Host - Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/stevenjkerzner

Panel

Hafeez Noorani - http://Twitter.Com/FEEZYdoesit

Nour Hadidi - http://Twitter.Com/NourHadidi

Justine Gallo

Liana Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/RedLianaK

item.itunes:title: EP #5 - ZODCAST - FAKE TAX CUTS & CONSERVATIVE PARTY'S (SOLD) SOUL
item.description:
"Don't make me angry...you won't like me when I'm angry." That's what David Banner warned people just before turning into TV's Incredible Hulk.

Well, Neil's angry - and we do like him! Soft-spoken Neil takes a bite out of Andrew Scheer's fake tax cuts as he and Lauren expose Scheer's deceptive tactics and discuss political burnout and Neil talks with Gerry Nichols, former VP to Stephen Harper at the ultra-conservative National Citizens Coalition, about Stephen Harper, how conservatism has changed, about the election campaign and the party leaders, as well as the importance of reaching across party lines and realizing that we are all Canadians. Gerry is a straight shooter who pulls no punches about the state of Canadian politics. And in a special satirical twist, Neil closes with 'story time'.

Hosts: Neil Waytowich - http://Twitter.Com/ThatsMrNeil

Lauren Griffith - http://Twitter.Com/HalandLolo

item.title: EP #7 - MENSPLAINING - SITCOM DADS - WHY ARE THEY ALWAYS SUCH IDIOTS?
item.itunes:title: EP #7 - MENSPLAINING - SITCOM DADS - WHY ARE THEY ALWAYS SUCH IDIOTS?
item.description:
Once, in the early days of TV, the message was Father Knows Best. But it's been a slip-slide from capable, professional, competent TV sitcom fathers to Tim Taylor, Al Bundy, Kevin James, Jim Belushi, Jay Pritchett, Danny Tanner... why does TV tell us that men are incompetent dads full of hare-brained schemes they require their wife to bail them out of? Oh and by the way, the guy is usually half a slob and his wife could win a beauty contest. What does this tell us about what society expects of men, and what men expect from society?

Don't worry, it's funny too.

Host:

Ed the Sock - http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock

Panelists:

Andrew Willis - http://Twitter.Com/AndyLandRadio

Mo Amir - http://Twitter.Com/Vancolour

Stuart Benson - http://Twitter.Com/LeftHandStu

Hey, did you know you can take credit for us making more shows? You can if you support us with subscriptions of $1, $5, $10...sky's the limit. And so is the potential of this network to take back the type of media Canadians had taken from us. FU - For Us. Be part of the us. Just go to http://Patreon.Com/funetworktv and you can Give Us Money! You can also do it at Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com

item.title: EP #11 - The NO BULLpen - SCHEER WILL "PUT MONEY BACK IN OUR POCKET." SERIOUSLY?! HAS ANY GOVT EVER??
item.itunes:title: EP #11 - The NO BULLpen - SCHEER WILL "PUT MONEY BACK IN OUR POCKET." SERIOUSLY?! HAS ANY GOVT EVER??
item.description:
Andrew Scheer keeps pledging that he'll 'put more money back in our pocket'. It's a frequent promise by political leaders. But has ANY government ever really put a noticeable amount of 'money back in our pocket' without taking more of it from the other pocket? Does the middle-class ever really benefit from tax cuts - or do we all just pay for the promise with cuts to essential services?!

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Panel:

Andrew McLeod, legislative burueau chief, thetyee.com - https://Twitter.Com/A_MacLeod_Tyee

Liana Kerzner - political commentator, journalist, lecturer, Youtuber, a voice for social and women's issues - https://Twitter.Com/RedLianaK

John Sheppard - Newfoundlander offering his political perspective from the point-of-view as a "lost" conservative

Justin Whitehead - political commentator on issues of economics, politics & applied ethics with a focus on cheque-to-cheque Canadians. - http://Twitter.Com/OriginalJDW

The NO BULLpen is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

No pundits, no jargon, no zealots - honest talk with knowledgeable, opinionated people w/sense of humour.

item.title: EP #4 - ZODCAST - AUTISM & DOUG FORD PLUS TWITTER SNAFUS FOR POLITICIANS
item.itunes:title: EP #4 - ZODCAST - AUTISM & DOUG FORD PLUS TWITTER SNAFUS FOR POLITICIANS
item.description:
This week Neil introduces new co-host Lauren Griffith, and they speed date for co-hosts with the 2019 Federal Election, discuss how poor Andrew Scheer was, Twitter punditry, and rap battles for political junkies.
Neil talks with Max Fawcett about forgiveness in the age of social media and why politicians deserve a second chance after social media mistakes. We also discuss why Alberta has to change it's thinking regarding it's oil and gas resources to find the prosperity it seeks, Jason Kenney's belligerency and his national political aspirations, and the upcoming election.
In the final segment, Neil talks with autism mom and advocate @AlineSociology about changes to the autism program at CHEO, about the disastrous management of the Ontario Autism Program by the Ford Government, the negative effect of these changes have had immigrant families, and what she would like to say to Todd Smith.

item.itunes:title: EP #9 - MATTER OF FACT - ELECTION 2019 -- GO!!
item.description:
Election 2019 - as of September 11, it's on! Wait...September 11? Did they think that through??

Ishat Reza & guest co-host, lawyer Stephen Lautens, with the amazing Professor S lay down Election Canada's rules for political parties - and there are a lot! Plus election related fails, and fact or fictions, with Ishat and Professor S!

https://Twitter.Com/ishat_reza

item.title: EP #10 - The NO BULLpen - NDP/GREEN SH*TSHOW & MAXIME BERNIER
item.itunes:title: EP #10 - The NO BULLpen - NDP/GREEN SH*TSHOW & MAXIME BERNIER
item.description:
Continuing our examination of the parties' slogans, messages and media we look at Jagmeet Singh & NDP's slogan ("HEY, WE'RE OVER HERE!), Elizabeth May and the Green Party (Can't recall their slogan, sorry) and the musical chairs between the parties. Plus, for some reason, we use up oxygen to talk about Maxime Bernier's Peoples Party of Canada and the 23 people who will vote for them.

Host: Steven Kerzner - http://Twitter.Com/StevenJKerzner

Panelists:

Lauren Griffith - https://Twitter.Com/HalandLolo

Hafeez Noorani - http://Twitter.Com/FeezyDoesIt

Justin Whitehead - http://Twitter.Com/OriginalJDW

item.title: EP #6 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS WITH ED THE SOCK!
item.itunes:title: EP #6 - ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM POLITICS WITH ED THE SOCK!
item.description:
Ed the Sock tears a strip off ignorant partisans and the Liberal campaign's PR team - and that's before we get into Trudeau's debate cherry-picking and Hafeez and Ed get into it over Chick-Fil-A, plus new panelist Tyler Watt talks about Doug Ford's promise to eliminate "hallway medicine". Ed's got a cold so he's even more....Ed....than usual.

Host: Ed the Sock - http://Twitter.Com/EdTheSock

Panelists:

Hafeez Noorani - http://Twitter.Com/FeezyDoesIt

Justin Whitehead - http://Twitter.Com/OriginalJDW

Stuart Benson - http://Twitter.Com/LeftHandStu

and introducing....Tyler Watt! - http://Twitter.Com/tylerwhat16

Support our shows on Patreon! We need it. This stuff is cheap but it ain't THAT cheap. http://patreon.com/funetworktv Our humble thanks.

item.title: EP #8 - MATTER OF FACT: RECONCILIATION REPORT CARD
item.itunes:title: EP #8 - MATTER OF FACT: RECONCILIATION REPORT CARD
item.description:
"Reconciliation" is a word we've heard a lot the past few years. Yet most non-Indigenous people have only a passing understanding of what it means. This episode Ishat & Professor S give Canada a report card on our progress with First Nations issues. Plus some fails dealing with foreign intrusions into our politics and two Fact or Fictions that will test your knowledge of today’s topic!

Follow #iReza and Professor S on Twitter:
https://Twitter.Com/ishat_reza
https://Twitter.Com/RCI_101

Matter Of Fact is an #FU_Politics Original Podcast

item.title: EP #5 - MENSPLAINING - PORN - IT SHAPES A LOT OF BOYS & MEN'S IDEAS ABOUT SEX & WOMEN. BENIGN FUN OR MALIGNANT MESSAGING?
item.itunes:title: EP #5 - MENSPLAINING - PORN - IT SHAPES A LOT OF BOYS & MEN'S IDEAS ABOUT SEX & WOMEN. BENIGN FUN OR MALIGNANT MESSAGING?
item.description:
PORN! It's all over the net. I'm not telling you anything you don't already know intimately.

How does it distort young boys' concept of sex and does it stay with them as adults?; how does porn affect a man's attitude toward women?; what porn is healthy viewing & what's toxic?; how porn drives technology; is there anything shameful about watching porn (running up a hotel PPV bill on the company's dime not included); the different role same-sex porn plays in a gay or lesbian person's life. These and many other aspects of the world's oldest artform (it's been found on pottery from Mesopotamia) are discussed and debated with a load of laughs too. Yes, I said "load".

The conversation's depth & breadth may surprise you...it certainly surprised the panelists!

Host: Ed the Sock

@EdTheSock on Twitter

Panel:

Hafeez Noorani - @FeezyDoesIt - digital content & marketing pro and producer of Mensplaining.

Andy Willis - @Andylandradio - host of Andyland radio on CiTR radio, pop culture maven. And Ed in this episode, Ed starts to doubt Andy's 100% gay .

Paul Marlow - @TallPaulsLife tallpaul.ca - At 6'7" Paul Marlow can't go camping because of Bigfoot hunters. Paul is a personal trainer from Vancouver founder of Never Alone - a support campaign and line of clothing for people with depression. As well Paul is a content producer and blogger that talks about both mental and physical health.

Hey, did you know you can take credit for us making more shows? You can if you support us with subscriptions of $1, $5, $10...sky's the limit. And so is the potential of this network to take back the type of media Canadians had taken from us. FU - For Us. Be part of the us. Just go to http://Patreon.Com/funetworktv and you can Give Us Money! You can also do it at Paypal: funetworktv@gmail.com
